Я считаю свом долгом поставить этой игре оценку выше 7 точно, ибо такой душевной в хорошем плане игры не выходило уже давно. Однако, игру немного портят баги и постоянные трабблы с озвучкой, которая звучит одновременно и отлично, и временами вгоняет в ступор, как тот же актёр, что экспрессивно выдал предыдущую сцену, так монотонно, без нужных выделений (которые даже есть в субтитрах) прочитал этот текст. А, да, ну и стелс в этой игре вполне "на уровне" предыдущих метро.Однако, все эти недочеты ИМХО несущественны, я получил тонну удовольствия просто слушая разговоры каждого из членов команды, ловил НЕ попсовые отсылки, понятые в основном постсоветским игрокам. Отдельно на ржекич пробили зайцы, посреди весны плывущие на плоту (видимо Мазай ушёл в местную луддитскую церковь)

На мой взгляд это лучшая игра за последние 3 года, то есть меня вообще ни одна игра так не цепляла, этот же прекрасный шедевр я прошел за два дня просто залпом, при этом я не просто пробежал сюжет а исследовал каждый уголок. Игра прекрасна во всем, мне понравился общий дизайн, локации просто завораживают, у игры отличнейший саундтрек. Но не понравилось управление лодками, уж очень тягомотно.Концовка это просто разрыв души, меня ни одна игра так не трогала за душу. Реально игра просто самый настоящий шедевр искусства. 10 из 10.

WARNING!! THIS REVIEW CONCERNS THE GAME ITSELF AND NOT WHERE IT IS SOLD AT.metro exodus is the third and best installment of the metro series, after using the profit to fix the issues of the previous games, it became worthy in terms of technical aspect to adapt a novel as good as the international best selling novel metro.the game most excels at atmosphere, the dialogue between the character.it certainly been a while since we got a post apocalyptic the balances between game play and plot as well as metro exodusthe game-play isnt the best ou there or the worst, it is enjoyable and unique when you battle monsters underground in the dark and generic shooter against humansgraphics improved a lot over the previous games and it did look really beautiful at moments, however it was inconsistent and i felt like i was playing past gen game at another momentthe most notable difference in this installment is exploration, which in my opinion, is always worth it for developers to invest since i forget myself in front a good map with good lootis it worth the full price?definitely since it has good replay-ability due to the many decisions you make in it.
it would be 9 if there was better attachment to previous games and better optimalization on day one

Before reading please consider that i started playing with version 1.0.1.2 of the game (Feb 26 2019 Patch) To be honest i dont give a rats ass if some people are mad because they have to use the epic store to play this game. Just click on the f***** desktop icon, play the game and stfu. Also i dont care if some of you guys expect it to run 60fps+ on a gtx1060 gpu in 4k maxed out. It looks way too good to make that possible, and also the performance is definitely adequate for what you get smooth on your screen in the end. I use a ryzen 5 2600x, 16gbs of ram and a vega 56 and it runs really good on wqhd in high settings. No stuttering, no input lag, not a sinlge crash or freeze throughout the whole (!) walkthrough... just smooth. There is absolutely no reason for whining or complaining. Any negative comment or review about the performance not being optimized for PC is either bull**** or written by haters. Gameplay is also (almost) as you would expect it from a metro game that goes "open world". Still very close to the predecessor when it comes to the overwhelming atmosphere, storytelling and excellent gunplay. Also i loved the side stories, that you only get to see when you take your time listening and watching your companions for longer than just a few seconds (the game's atmosphere/storytelling does definitely not work for rushers). And yes, there are still a few minor bugs (watch your step^^) and the enemy AI (still) does not always work 100% properly, but it really is not bad at all. Overall i rate this game with a 9, because of the positive aspects, which are some of the best i have ever seen (and i really play a lot).
Great game. 4A games have nailed the atmosphere of the game and i haven't experienced that in any other game. The visuals on PC and console looks perfect.

Well I say for every person or angry hater who has expressed an unfavorable opinion of this game their wrong. I had big hype for this game. It actually is quite beautiful and I can see all the hours that were put into making it. However all of this hard work and dedication is overshadowed by the terrible launcher I have to use. The Epic store client keeps crashing so I can't play. I sit besides my best friend playing it on the Epic Launcher and it crashed every 5 minute, so this god damn Epic Launcher destroyed this game, I prefer waiting a year until 2020 and buy it on Steam so I don't need another useless launcher who is just for kids, this launcher gives no real support or something good. And this game isn't even optimized, why the hell you need a Intel i9 for the best game settings? Спасибо за баги, которые невозможно решить без переигрывания главы. Неужели никому из разработчиков не пришло в его голову, что если и делать систему с сохранения, то нужно разделять её на слоты. В какой игре вы подсмотрели этот хромой вариант с квиксевом? Такое ощущение что игра несколько раз менял курс во время разработки. Изначально планировали сделать старую линейную игру, затем открытый мир, а потом получился этот пустой кусок локации, где исследования вообще не поощряются. И Этот немой ГГ. В первых 2х частях серии Метро это было нормальным. Однако теперь к герою обращаются, что-то спрашивают, но он стоит как идиот. А другой идиот, его собеседник, сам отвечает на свои вопросы.

This game is a real work of art. Let me begin by saying that the atmosphere and the environments they created are the real heroes of this game. You immediately feel immersed in the post-apocalyptic landscapes. This had just the right amount of scary moments for me; foreboding atmosphere with the occasional jump-scare. Graphically an A+. The game-play is solid, a nice mix between stealth and combat. The weapons feel responsive and satisfying. The pacing of the game is nothing short of masterful; moments of intensity are punctuated by some real serene scenes.  The only downside is that I was left wanting more of it. Another chapter or two would have been great. The story was really moving, and the characters encountered felt real. Got some real "Heart of Darkness" and "Lord of the Flies" feelings from time to time. A real glimpse into the nature of humanity. The only negatives were some hard crashes that were rectified by frequent driver updates. A semi-negative is that I wish there was more. This is a credit to the quality of what's there, but I would have liked some more time to use the sweet weapons I got near the end of the game. Even if you've never played a game like this before, be sure to pick this one up.

Не могу сказать что игра идеальная на 10 из 10. Безусловно у игры очень много недостатков, но несмотря на это мне было очень интересно играть. Я фанат вселенной метро. Возможно поэтому я не обращаю внимание на её недостатки. Графика хороша. Стрельба неплохая. Багов (я встретил) мало. Сюжет бомба. Атмосфера передаётся идеально. Я считаю, что это твёрдая 8

Не буду врать игра не на 10 баллов и во основном проблемы в техническом плане , атмосфера в игре на все 10 балов да чучуть пустой отрытый мир  но это все прощается.  В конце концов Глуховский создал тот мир который заставляет задуматься что пиздец уже близко господа , давайте жить дружно

The game is unplayable for me, Multiple crashes on start up, then constant lag.SpecsGtx 1080 TiIntel Core i7 - 7770k---------------------------------This is the worst optimized game, I have played, well wait couldn't even play it. I am currently waiting for a refund through epic games, Which, I know why it is no longer on steam, Because the reviews would have been terrible. I would say pick it up for xbox or ps4. For PC it is unplayable for me at least.

1) Terrible optimization. Games on my hardware (i5 6600 + gtx 950) are capable of producing an excellent (not bad, at least) picture in 60 fps, recall the same Witcher 3 or at least Wildlands. Such a terrible situation as with this Metro I have not seen for a long time. The picture on my settings is not better than I had in Metro Redux, but at the same time in previous versions I had a stable 60 + fps, here I has 50 with drawdowns below 30 and frametime jumps.2) There is also a huge amount of physics bugs. Some objects do not have a physical model (although it would be better for them to have it), some of them are generally floating in the air. Also, a large number of objects have a texture on one side only, but on another side they are transparent. And, of course, if you’re just running through the game (it seems that this is exactly what the developers were counting on by releasing the game), then you may be will not notice it, but it is worthwhile to at least linger on the level and all the problems will pop up at the moment.3) Tightened skirmishes. Monsters spawns endlessly, why we have no chance to kill them all? You force us to just run through the levels (read the second part…), For it is often simply impossible to kill all the monsters, or it takes too many resources.4) Tightened missions, which in the end cause only a desire to quickly move on to the next mission.5) The system of customization and modification of weapons can be compared with Wildlands - it seems like there are a lot of modifications, but actually it’s impossible to do something truly unique. In fact, all you need is a rifle with a silencer.6) Separately, I will say that the game has no problems with zoom. I mean if the sight has an approximation of "X6", then it really approximates 6 times, and not like in some games - only two or even less.7) The plot is pretty good. In fact, this is the only thing that makes me play this game. Without it I would delete after the first hour of the game. Really, gameplay is just disgusting.I would like to add that critics who rate this game 8 and above do not have the right to be called critics. The word itself contains the verb "to criticize" - what they do not do. At a minimum, due to such technical problems, it should not receive ratings higher than 7.My score for this game is absolute zero.

Not as much fun as previous metro titles.No achievements because of Epic store, which removes a lot of the replayability for me as I always took multiple playthroughs to complete them.Found the movement and aiming a bit lacking - there is a delay when I sweep the mouse from side to side that almost feels like using a controller on a console. Don't remember this in previous metro titles.Multiple instances of crouching perfectly still with the reticle directly on an enemies head and subsequently missing the headshot - fully clean weapon; another annoying mechanic.Not a lot to do in the "open world" except shoot up a camp of enemies and loot an item - most of the time nothing significant and a waste of time.Even with side quests and exploring all question marks on the maps plus some additional exploration the game felt incredibly short which would be fine if the game were cheaper.The transition into what I am assuming are cutscenes (fps drops to 31-33 during them) was very choppy, almost like the game froze for a second as they changed from in game to the pre-rendered video. If this game was £30 instead of £50 and has achievements like the steam store had it would probably be a 6/10.
Немой герой. Не адекватное немотивированное поведение персонажей. Боты (даже на хардкоре) ведут себя как идиоты.

Looks good, nice story and cool areas to explore. However, combat is just so very boring. There is nothing novel about it. It's your standard point and shoot experience that was outdated already 15 years ago. Boring weapons that look realistic but have arcade behavior like ridiculously short range. No room for improvisation like throwing items or setting up traps using the environment. Meh. For some reason I thought it would be something like Prey with room for creativity. But nope, this game has combat that is as basic and boring as it gets.

Сплошной обман:Графику натянули на консоли - нет и десятой части того, что обещали.Пиарились через STEAM, после чего обвинили игроков на ПК в пиратстве и отказались выпускать игру в STEAM даже тем, кто уже заплатил за предзаказ, зато выпустили её на собственной торговой площадке, с которой в день релиза были похищены десятки тысяч аккаунтов.Угрозы в адрес пк игроков о том, что если пк-версия будет плохо продаваться, то следующую часть выпустят только на консолях - откровенное свинство.Те, кто планировал скачать пиратскую версию всеравно её скачают, неважно откуда, а страдать и терпеть оскорбления от хамоватых менеджеров, нет уж, увольте, я за бойкот Epic games и metro:exodus.

Эм, при запуске игра убила систему так как грузилась на ультрах и пришлось загружать резервную копию системы.Запустить смог только с помощью проги от nvidia. Epic store ужасен, и как хорошо для них, что я не могу вернуть свои деньги за эту "игру". Я кончил

Boring, boring and boring. Sorry, but thats not Metro. First: Anna is boring. Can anyone remove her from the game please? She is useless.Second: The gang is boring. Endless dialogs with an mute Artjom. All the npc babble like chatterboxes, Artjom - silence. No way to cut the endless conversations.Third: The gameplay is boring. Even at hardcore its more an walk-through than a challenge.Fourthly: Endlessly loot picking is boring. press E for two bullets, press E for two bullets, press E for two bullets. Booooooring! Conclusion: Is miss everything I loved on Metro and LL. I cant feel anything from the hype on Metro Exodus. I am very disappointed at the moment. One point for the nice but not mindblowing gfx. edit: I finished that palgue and I am happy that I shot one good to much so that Artjom died, R.I.P. my old friend. My rating now for the chapters (from 1 worst to 10 best): prologue: 2, lacks of logic, but so what, it's an prologue.volga: 5,semi open world muddy terrain environment, Ithought it was boring while playing but after finishing that game its maybe the best part.yamatau: 5, ok, that part is funny here and there but to short to give the game an other spin. But at least a lot of shooting here.caspian desert: 2, semi openworld monotone desert environment, not challenging anyway, but not to much Anna and boring dialogs, so it gets 3 points minus one for the absolutely annoying sandstorms.the valley: 4, simple linear level, no open world parts, easy to solve without the senseless bear "boss" fight ( I still doesnt know wy i "won" after a dozen of similar fights, most annoying scene of the game. Detailed but oldfashioned graphics, pitiable.dead city: 1, desperately helpless attempt to create a stalker like environment. strictly linear design , boring as hell, wtf are they thinking? Uninspired winter environment. beside this: poor PC port, poor game mechanics. Sometimes "bandits" were beamed to other places in the map or disappear like ghosts while you sneak behind them just to respan a littler further. Ah, and,  ehm, Artjom is'nt mute, he can "aaaargh" and "oouch" but is unable to say a word unless how much the rest of the gang or Anna persuade on him. After all and as I said before this game miss everything that makes metro great. A good story, unexpected changes, open questions. What happened to the dark one's for example? Furthermore it looks like the parts are developed by different teams. I've played both metro and LL three times at last and will hold them high forever (as I do with stalker) but I am happy after deleting this piece of garbage from my disc. mission not accomplished, 4A games!
This game has a very bad publisher and is ridiculously short. Characters are too stupid.

This game is total crap, a pure GARBAGE with an astronomical demanding for a NASA PC yet it looks more like Fallout 76 then like a BF1 or 5, with his disgusting animation that spoils everything, overall feels like a game made in 2012 and above all this "Metro Dev: If PC gamers boycott us over we are upset you saymoving to Epic, then we just won't make games for PC" Well Sherlock, with this occasion may we announce you that this game are quite free atm, 5 days from its release, and you deserve this slapp in your face

Из плюсов игры можно выделить отличную работу художников, а так же внимание к деталям. Так же музыку которая навевает ностальгию. Средняя возможность кастомизации предметов и слабый, но все таки крафт, но все равно хорошо когда такое есть, чем когда такого нет. Неплохая озвучка. А все остальное по игре один сплошной минус и халтура:1) Сюжет. Несмотря на то, что по сюжету вселенной прошло 20-ть лет после конца света, на лицо полная деградация и падение нравов, люди из образованных (хотя бы 9-ть классов) скатились в дремучую деревню это все равно, что те представители, которые сейчас сидят в сети, зная все и вся и разбираясь во всем, через двадцать лет начнут молиться сому и поехавшему человеку с именем Селантий это скорее претензия ко всей серии книг Глуховского, но исходя из этой парадигмы и идет развитие, оно все такое, атмосфера напоминает аркхем асилум, где все сошли с ума и деградировали. ГГ немой мальчик на побегушках, без права выбора, которым по сути пользуются все кому не лень, лицемерно изображая закадычных друзей, но оправляя решать самоубийственные задания в одиночку. Персонажи как и сюжет шаблонные и придуманы на коленке, хотя одержимая свои мужем жена ГГ еще более менее прикольная, хотя он крутой всех вокруг мочит в одиночку, да и вокруг грязные безумцы и вся жизнь в подземелье провела, наверное тоже тронулась.2) Мир. Мир на 95-99% состоит из врагов, аля безумный макс и бедных нестрашных инвалидов гулей. Кругом одни безумцы и все по уши в дерьме.3) ИИ. Самый тупой ИИ за последнее время мной виданный, хотя эти ребята свояли сталкер с интересными перестрелками, но тут же стелс - нафик ненужный, мир слишком безумен и врагов кругом слишком много чтобы вжиться в стелс. Большинство врагов тебя не видят в упор и начинают агриться когда стреляешь в них, не меняя позиции, граны и молотовы тоже не используют, даже на супер сложности.4) Геймплей. Слабый сюжет должен компенсироваться гейплеем, а вот нет, количество диалогов которые нельзя пропустить и вникай в это деньги уплочены, стань сомелье вторичности, может понравиться. Ходи по рельсам заданий, с отвратительно реализованной стрельбой в тупых болванчиков и любуйся работой художников.Можно еще под стелсом вырубать злодеев с кулака толпами, под звук удара из старых индийских фильмов - на суперсложности, не хватает только крика "Кия". С небольшими лирическим отступлениями, в виде покатушек на таблетке или отпугиванием тараканов фонариком.5) Графика. Обилие косметики в игре, но движок то старый с отвратительная анимацией. Нас не обманешь. Как будто старую бабку накачали гормонами и накрасили косметикой и заставили играть молодуху в молодежном сериале. От чего мой компьютер неплохо так нагрузился.6) Оптимизация. Сыровато, есть баги

(Non-Bias)Exodus is very well optimized (2080Ti, 4k HDR monitor) and the visuals compared to Metro 2033 and Metro Last Light. From its open world Exodus still brings back the game to its roots over and over and it honestly pleases as well. Those times in the dark and suffocating buildings and metro tunnels always brought a sense of fear and wanting to not enter at times. But even though that is true Exodus does feel like there are some missions that drag on the story and it takes the game a little while to advance its story which shouldn't be this way. The actual story is very well written and does satisfy the direction of the story as well and doesn't leave anything left out. The characters interact more with Artyom and it envelopes you into the life and the way everyone looks and cares for you and much more happy atmosphere. There are numerous bugs in the visuals but nothing that can make you not want to continue playing the game. It satisfies until the every end and makes you appreciate everyone and everything since the very first Metro, I guarantee it.

Deep Silver, the publisher, pulled the move to Epic at the last moment.  NOT 4A.  Also, 4A does not get more money from that move automatically.  The contract they signed with Deep Silver may allow for it, or it may not.  Only they know. As for the game it is good, bordering on great at moments but falls flat with highly repetitive combat, underwhelming enemies mostly due to questionable AI, and bugs (audio, pathing, some texture, FPS issues, and saved games that are occasionally put in the wrong folder!). The worst two complaints are the dropped sense of alien qualities (anomalies are poorly integrated, dark ones are MIA, etc), as well as the artificially linear nature of many parts of the game.  While you were in the Metro you only had singular pathways so that was immersive, but now you are supposedly free, but that is not really evident.  Your train is the new metro, and you are just moving from station to station clearing each with copypasta combat that amounts to kill everything that moves. It is just too bad that they did not develop the Stalker-ish aspects now that they have more room to play in, or continue the story path that the first two Metro games was developing.  I consider this more of a soft reboot than a sequel. As for performance, the Xbox version seems to run quite well.  The PC port is far less stable.  At least the Epic store was shamed into a refund policy before Exodus was released.  While 4A promised a pre-release fix for many of these issues they seem to have missed that deadline.  When these issues get patched then this will be a solid 7, but currently it is only a 5.

Very good game, very atmospheric. Beautiful graphics, even on high and even without HW, tesselation and RTX. All textures extra sharp, faces of characters and face animations much much more realistic which improve immersion. Much more content than previous parts. Story is better and attachment to characters kinda stronger.

This "review" is on the state of the game being unplayable and made as to warn people to be cautious with this title as it is highly buggy i love the metro series but i hope in doing this it may lead to someone fixing it and if not i get to vent lol. The game crashed constantly on load up causing many restarts and a disappearing inoperable mouse.I use 2 screens and watch something in the background as MANY do but this game doesn't offer windowed mode or like to be alt tabbed (computer has a 1080, i7 8000 something along those line and 32gb ram INB4 a update your rig comment) and decides to crash completely upon doing so. the game runs like a dog but looks great when running, i deeply regret buying the game at launch as it's a mess, i really really love the series and look forward to playing it when it works if it ever does i'll change my review but the game itself for me is too buggy to buy into i hope you read this and make the decision for yourself! i don't like the epic games store but it has nothing to do with this "review" my score is low because the games not playable for me currently and i'm pissed because i bought it day one like a sucker and it crashes whenever i start and or play.... damn i want to play this all the way  through, i guess resi 2 will have to tide me over.

This part of METRO is really gorgeous. I have nothing negative to say. This time the producers guessed what to fill the game. Gorgeous graphics, excellent sound for every scene, gorgeous mechanics, no crash, what else to say?Just cool.

You know what? This game really is a huge disappointment. I am a big fan of the previous titles as well as the first book (the second one sucked as the cash cow it was). I have not finished the thing yet, but I consider this as a heads up to everybody who was as hyped as I was. Let's start with the good:1. The story is sort of intriguing. It's not genius, but I suppose it is the only thing keeping me going at the moment, as I've have not played/read a good post-apocalyptic (let alone Russian) sci-fi in a while. 2. I somewhat like the old-style quest tracking, where the game does not really hold your hand (for the most part) as what you are supposed to do and how. Although tracking side-quests in your diary would help. 3. the weapon system is pretty neat. You can customise weapons however you like (and on the go) and need to keep them clean in order to work properly. Weapons, in general, are fun to shoot. Handling and sound look immersive and realistic. Then comes the rest.1. First off the optimisation is terrible with framerates fluctuating between 30-100 fps on a fairly beefed up PC. 2. Main characters are so f/ing annoying! Dialogues are so poorly written and the (over-)acting is laughable at best. Moreover, all the NPCs are cheering for you or hugging you all the time - don't know what kind of fantasy is being fulfilled there. 3. The atmosphere of Metro is mostly gone. The environment is empty and dull and looks like an offspring of Stalker but not in a good way. I have not felt any kind of suspense during my 6 hours of the playthrough. 4. Movement is so goddamn clunky and never works properly (being stuck on the geometry all the time, falling from ledges, climbing animation looks like from the 90s etc) 5. Fighting - apart from the weapon mechanics as described above- is just horrible. AI is plain stupid and cheats at the same time, which further contributes to the completely broken stealth system. On hardcore difficulty, the game is way too hard to be enjoyable (also thanks to the scarcity of ammo), while being too easy on normal. 6. Graphics look like 7 years ago. My recommendation is to wait for a sale. Maybe they will polish this into something playable by then.

WOW, all the negativity?? Just because they moved from Steam? (where were you when RDR2 delivered an absolutely boring thing they call a game?) How sad gamers can be so shallow.  The game is terrific, the characters, the environment, the crafting, the story, the exploration, and the gameplay, makes the game simply fun to plan.  I see it as maybe what Fallout 4 could have been for a starter.  It has a very nice mix of open world and confined areas which I think was needed to move things along from the same'ol but holding onto some of the past.  Some conversations which make the story immersive do go on a bit too long, but some bring interesting backstory which makes the character and story more personal.  My only huge peeve is the load times... I don't get it when GOW and HZD have huge environments and can load in a fraction of the time.  I hope they will be putting out more content and maybe a Game+ option.  Thanks to the developers for putting the heartfelt effort into this game.. it's much appreciated.  And I hope the whiners will consider going console to get a better appreciation of the actual game experience.

I've played this for 2 days to see if the Boredom will disappear? I AM SUPER ANNOYED BECAUSE I LOVE THE METRO GAMES & I don't get it, this game is just BORING!!! and I struggle to keep coming back to it. The last 2 metro releases were pretty much great to play, I played both & Loved them & sadly though I got this next game in the series. I think it's safe to say that they have lost their way in how they developed this game. here are my 'OWN' mainly Bad but a couple Good thoughts on the game : Graphics :  they're ok but underwelming and at the same time great but everything is hard to see within the world, everything blends in with other things it's just weird and dull. Underground or in tunnels is very good though !! Sound: Awful NPC voices at times and the music is pretty much Meh... em and well Meh... Performance:  Never had any issues, no crashes, bugs that I can see. Storyline: jeez I've never ever been so bored (apart from fallout 76) with a story. It's just sooooooooo Utterly boring to wait and listen to the Npc's talking utter crap at times.. oh and I found my first cassette tape to play and I immediately sat back and thought OMFG this is fallout 76 holotapes. JEEEEZ.  So awful, just awful storyline. Fighting: I enjoy the fps side of the game although those pack animals that roam around in the evening in 3-7 packs are a pain. Crafting: It's basic but ok, nothing special Open world: Well it's not really an open world it can get quite linear which actually leads to (Again) boredom. I'm just lost for words and While I want to say it's great, It's NOT. At best this is a maybe 4/10 regarding fps side but as for the rest it's just an utterly Boring and Painfully attempt at changing what the 'Metro Series'is about and has FAILED. £10-15 Game at best Imho, Hope this helps anyone considering in paying for this. Do not look at 10/10 reviews they in my opinion are utter utter nonsense & possibly paid reviews , some kids/fanboys etc.. this is not a 10/10 game. Also some users on here have said they've posted reviews and they have been deleted  true/false I don't know but It is not uncommon for Companies to use this  awful practice. anyway cheers guys/girls hope this review gave you a perspective. :D

Да Вы ребята не при...ели внезапно? Шикарная игра, атмосферная. Я играл в первые части немного, и эта не уступает, если не наоборот. То графика не та, то озвучка, то сюжет,  Вы на себя то смотрели в зеркало... Все то? Да есть фризы, есть просадки, это у всех проектов есть. Видно что люди с любовью делали. Исправят патчами быстро и все наладится.

Сама атмосфера в игре прекрасна, но все что касается анимаций и стрельбы, сделано на уровне первого метро. И кстати спасибо что не выпустили игру в стиме, я сэкономил 2к деревянных и прошел на торент эдишн. Лайк издателю!
For me it's absolutely amazing game. Graphics, story and game-play is seriously simply the best. 10/10

Чего вы хотите от бедной компании у которой нету денег на разработку игры, и они делают всё на чистом энтузиазме, хватит блять жаловаться на то что у вас вылеты баги и на прочую хуйню, купите себе нормальное железо блять.

Finished this game yesterday (on PS4), and it was an amazing experience. The atmosphere and tension that this game makes you feel when you're sneaking around radioactive caves, enemy bases, abandoned train stations is absolutely worth the purchase alone. The game is gorgeous as well and it just bolsters the mood and scene that this game tries to create. The mix of linear FPS and the open world parts of this game were perfect for the pace of the game, and I was surprised that the linear mission Yamantau ended up being my favorite. The only reason it's not higher than a 9 is due to the long cut scenes and sometimes clunky movement. But overall, fantastic game just wish it was even longer!

Even though the Epic Games deal was a bad move and hurt the game's reputation considerably, it doesn't change the fact that this is a worthy successor to 2 of the most underrated Survival-First Person Shooters out there. The atmosphere remains a core component and isn't harmed by the move to a (semi-) open world. Shooting is satisfying with good gun sound design overall and assembling a gun with the brand new crafting system is a real highlight. The only real downsides are the minor technical problems which have either been caused by the rather unproven Epic Games Launcher or 4A Games themselves.I can heartily recommend this game to fans of the series or people who appreciate world-building,a tense atmosphere, solid gameplay and a well-rounded story
Люди способны поглощать каждый год новый Ассасин и закрывают глаза на его проблемы, но видимо у Метро такой льготы нет

What happened to Metro....First of all they released on the Epic Launcher which has VERY SHADY PRIVACY POLICIES.To top it all off, the Developer stated "If you don't like it, we wont make PC games anymore"Jeez... 1/10.

Игра очень душевная и явно понравилась многим, а тем кто ноет по поводу эпик стор - просим выйти. Мне понравилось все, эти моменты в поезде, игра на гитаре, атмосфера... Сейчас мало таких душевных игр... Побольше бы таких! Давно не испытывал таких ощущений... Крайне рекомендую кто играл в приведущие части!  Этот проект достоин вашего внимания! Да есть баги но это все "закрывается" сюжетом! Не бомбите вы изза Эпик стора!!!!!111 Ну да нету игры в стиме, надо же окупить такой труд...Итог: 12/10Ну и еще:Спасибо 4A Games, продолжайте в том же духе !З.Ы Всем нытикам:Хватит портить оценку игре,  Разработчики  не виноваты что "ты" такой неадекват

Metro Exodus - безусловно очень хорошая игра. Конечно, в ней есть недоработки, но без них никуда. Сюжет просто класс, трогает до глубины души. Ситуация с переходом в Epic Store неприятная, но это не повод занижать оценки игры. Для меня это Metro - игра года, однозначно. А покупать её или качать репак, решать уже вам.

Cant believe the hate for this game, it is spectacular. Especially with Ray Tracing it is mind blowing, immersive, and beautiful. Great story, especially if you've played the trilogy. Who cares about platforms that's a business decision people, the devs deserve love for this masterpiece.

Enjoyed it so much, i found it even better than Last Light, but 2033 is still at the top. There are so many emotional scenes, if you put more time into the game you can interact with other crew members and really get to know them better and also feel connected to some. ( my fav is Igor Dukov).The story is awesome, open-world sections don't feel boring at all, they also have some missions inspired by first Metro games. (i sometimes got hella scared).Soundtrack is epic, English voice actors did a fine job ( i know some found it strange, but i found it at least good, i'm sure Russian actors did better )I hope they continue the story through the DLCs soon, it's going to get even better! A must-buy game!

Эту игру нужно обьязательно пройти.История очень хороша, сразу видно по книге делали и сделали очень хорошо.Все персонажи очень хорошо проработанны и за каждого из них начинаешь переживать.Концовка убила меня эмоционально. Эту игру стоит пройти и я очень рад что прошёл.Отдельное спасибо 4A Games вы очень большие молодцы и не обращайте внимание на хейт со стороны других людей.
A great game, the best of the series, the game gets low marks for the Epic Store ... pathetic ... you have to play !!
Thank you so much 4A Games for creating such an atmospheric beautiful game, from start to finish the game looks amazing!

I am a huge fan of the prior games but this is really quite bad. Playing on PC the graphics are really really good, but it is let down by awful physics and obscure quest objectives. For example - running around the landscape or backing off from enemies - don't worry here is a chair or plant you can get stuck on and die,    Killed a hard enemy and pickedup their heavy weapon which worked perfectly for them - no worries now you have it, it jams after 3 shots. Found the enemy zombies that claw you do death with one swipe - no problem after 15 melee hits against them they are uninjured (despite you having a knife in various cut scenes the only melee is to use the extremely ineffective butt of you gun?.The dialogue is way, way, way too long and there is no way to skip through it. This is insanely annoying after you have been through it and the game crashes and then you have to go through it again...I really regret paying full price

At the begining, I was worried about change of environment. From the creepy, claustrophobic and creepy tunnels to the open world? I can tell you that you do not need to worry. The first area you will get (Volga) has perfect atmosphere as was in previous games and ktThat continues further on. I have encountered only 1 or 2 crashes, but other than that nothing. Game runs smoothly for me ( and I do not have some super PC) and looks great. Maybe lip-sync and face animations have been bad on some characters, but I can live with that. And please, do not listen other people **** about Epic store. Yes, you have to instal another platform, but it takes about 5 minutes. And Metro is worth it. If you like Metro world, go for it!!!

ну как можно так опозорится,я не понимаю.Атмосфера-1010,но когда ты подбегаешь на каспии к воротам города бандитов - они начинают в тебя стрелять разрывными снарядами.за КИЛОМЕТР!НА ДРУГОМ КОНЦЕ КАРТЫ!без остановки.какой идиот придумал это?главный герой замедляется в кустах...и в метре от них тоже.куча недоработок.на моей сборке - 7700к+1080+32 оперативы в двухканалке на 3000 этот шедевр ТОРМОЗИТ.В общем сделали хорошую идею,интересный сюжет,но реализация-кал.по сюжету - он хорош,но блин,сделайте вы вариативность прохождения более лояльной к игроку.чуть кого то убил - привет хреновая концовка.Самое сильное в игре-это атмосфера,это то,чего не хватает всем современным играм.звуки,скрипты,сложность и исследование-на высоте.реально давно такого не замечал,все кто сравнивают со сталкером-идите лесом,рядом не валялся сталкер по эмбиенту с метро.В общем когда разрабы научатся делать игры без патчей?

Metro Exodus is a great game. She's not perfect she has a lot of bugs, curve, facial animation, and of course the main disadvantage of silent Artyom. But despite all its shortcomings Metro Exodus, great game, very sincere, thoughtfully leisurely adventure, for me all its shortcomings faded into the background, they have become completely unimportant. It takes its history, atmosphere, all Russian gamers, I'm sure, were also impressed by the transfer of both the Russian spirit and the General atmosphere Of the world of metro Exodus. The train on which the heroes of the game travel, it becomes your home, the characters themselves are felt native to you. I passed the game, just a few hours ago and I am overwhelmed with emotions that very few games, books and movies can give, and is not this the main thing? Метро исход великолепная игра. Она не идеальна у нее полно багов, кривой лицевой анимации и конечно же главный минус, молчаливый Артем. Но несмотря на все ее недостатки Метро исход, великолепная игра, очень душевное, вдумчиво неторопливое приключение, для меня все ее недостатки отошли на второй план, они стали совершенно неважны. Она берет свое историей, атмосферой, все русские геймеры, уверен, были также впечатлены передачей, как русского духа, так и общей атмосферой мира Метро исход. Поезд на котором путешествуют герои игры, становится тебе домом, сами герои ощущаются родными тебе. Я прошел игру, буквально несколько часов назад и меня переполняют эмоции, которые очень немногие игры, книги и фильмы могут подарить, а разве не это главное?

Игра далеко не идеальна. Но она навсегда останется в моем сердце. В первую очередь за атмосферу и эмоции, которые мне она подарила. Достаточно неплохой сюжет, но пару дыр все-таки есть. Особенно понравилась последняя глава с накалом драмы. С технической точки зрение все хуже. Баги, краши, но думаю со временем пофиксят. Надеюсь, метро себя окупит. Спасибо 4a games за такой эксперианс!
Прекрасная игра, именно то, что надо для серии
Another Metro game , im playing the PC version and it is perfect i love it , 8.5/10 *and u can carry more ammo and item , just upgrade ur Armor @empleat101

Why the hate?  Just by reading the comments you can see they are all trolling.The game is not well optimized yet... specially when you use DX12, that's true.But with DX11 i had no crashes or bugs so far  whatsoever  (8hrs aprox.)So i since I can play the game and experience what it has to offer fully, i will not use that excuse to bomb-comment this game. Patches will eventually come.The game has created a very nice atmosphere, however maybe this time isnt as oppressive as the prequels just because you arent underground and surrounded by darkness all the time.The stealth is super enjojable, although maybe not as tense as in other Metro games. The firefights and the weapons feeling not so much... which is a shame specially when you use them so much, and you take into account that this is the 3rd entry already with the same fault.The maps are quite interesting... a bit too scripted but still very enjoyable.The facial expressions look stiff, and -in Spanish- the voice acting is atrocious. But hey... those are little unimportant details to me. Metro is not about that.I havent finished the game yet, but so far the story is very interesting and so promising.

Ok so far so good. Just like other metro games i really love this one as well. They get that atmosphere so well done, and when you add these awesome looking graphics its breath taking. Story so far has been good, and Anna damn I love her. Damn its good experience.There are also some negative stuff like random freezes, lip sync could have been done better just like audio mixing. But im used to that with metro games.Overall there are more positives then negatives with this game.And i am willing to ignore some negative stuff because overall im really enjoying this experience.

I played the very first game, then didn't for the follow up. I like the game story. In a way it's a basic premise but it is emotional in many ways. I did enjoy some of the conversations outside the main story and the notes you find. The graphics are pretty. The performance was fair with occasional skipping. Nothing major with bugs. The sounds were a strong point in the game. It helped establish the tension around you. The music was good but not distracting. You can craft you weapons 5-7 ways and with various addons, but can only carry 3. The crafting system is simple and efficient. I enjoyed the combat and the sens of exploration. Not an open world, but at least 2 of the maps are large enough. I give it a 82%. Thank you for the Metro series Deep Silver.

Зачем игру ненавидеть за то, что она вышла в другом лончере? Что за идиотизм? Если бы вы действительно хотели поиграть в стиме - предзаказали бы да и всё.Если игнорировать дебильные отзывы вроде "гафно! в епек сторе!!!", то думаю средняя оценка будет где-нибудь между 8-9, и если подумать то вскрываются НАСТОЯЩИЕ проблемы этой игры.Например деревянные анимации и медленное перемещение, если раньше за анимации винить было довольно трудно т.к. всё делалось маленькой студией и без издателя, то сейчас то в чём проблема была выделить деньги на моушин каптчур что-бы персонажи двигались как надо?
In principle, the game is good, but there are a lot of minor bugs, bad animations, but for me, the atmosphere and plot will override most of the problems.
Loved the game! Best game! I bought on Epic Stor nothing terrible. I am waiting for the continuation on the PC !!!!

Попробую рассказать что и как.Плюсы:Микроменеджмент действий персонажа. Протереть маску, подзарядить фонарик и тд,Игра все еще осталась дико атмосферной и притягательной за счет своего фирменного стиляСделала шаг вперед в развитии сюжета(об этом и в минусах) и проработки игрового мира и персонажей, как хороших так и плохих.Отличная геймплейная механика крафта и взаимодействия мира в целом.Приятная смесь линейности периодически перекрываемая псевдо-открытым миром. Минусы:Почему они не озвучили главного персонажа? я понимаю что это позволяет отождествлять себя с ГГ и так далее, но в разрезе игры где очень много союзных персонажей с тобой говорит, молчание воспринимается как что то неуместное и периодически оставляет в недоумении.Смятая, сумбурная и слегка кривая концовка оставляет негативные ощущения, особенно на контрасте с последней миссией от которой волосы на руках дыбом вставали.Странная система хорошей/плохой концовки, которая оставила не очень хороший осадок в следствии ее непродуманности. Лично я бы предпочел увидеть одну и гораздо более хорошо сделанную, я не хочу всю игру всех спасать что бы заслужить хорошую, я хочу играть в удовольствие используя игровую механику на полную не ограничивая себя во всем. По поводу того что пишут в негативных отзывах.Стим или Эпик: только глупый человек будет ставить плохую оценку руководствуясь этой причиной.Баг или не Баг: у себя за всю игру я поймал только один баг ИИ и считаю это отличнм результатом.Анимация лиц: после андромеды у меня иммунитет. И почему то до того как я прочитал все эти комменты я считал что такая анимация это фирменный стиль, а не халтура. Но тут не буду спорить, у каждого свое мнение. И как результат: я считаю что игра стоит того что бы ее купить и пройти, может чуть позже когда появится скидки. она затягивает и погружает вас в свою атмосферу и проходится на одном дыхании.

Очень крутая, атмосферная и реалистичная игра. Мне очень понравилось. Проходил неделю, спокойно и неспеша, чтобы все осмотреть. Довольно не плохо удалось совместить Сталкер и Метро. Сюжет крут, атмосфера на высоте. А также спасибо за возможность самому выбирать что делать с врагами.

Really nice graphics and writing, but otherwise a very clumsy title full of euro jank. Gameplay is at its best when sneaking, but gunfight is not great. Probably the worst aspect are the terrible cutscenes. Sound effects, voice acting, and music are all really poor. The reverb destroys any clarity in the dialogues which is already bad with the Russian accent. The game does a terrible job of communicating with the player. Most of the times you have no idea what you have to do. The UI is mediocre at best.

Shrugs. Maybe it's because I started playing it after the patches, but it runs beautifully on my machine, and is a genuinely fun game. Excellent graphics, sound, story, gun play, etc... And I love the little aspects like having to charge your electricity pack once in a while with a few hand pumps, etc... Great game, most of the low scores are from people with technical issues or those that really hate the Epic store. But the game itself is actually very fun. I'm having a blast, at least.
I can't believe this game is being so shamefully review bombed by butthurt steam users. It's an EXCELLENT game, try it and you'll see.

To be honest, i think this game is beeing quite overrated.Theres nothing special about the game that havent been done before, infact it has quite alot less interesting content than other games in its genre. Theres not alot of enemy variation, basicly around 5 or 6, and its the same ones in every zone.The weapon upgrade system feels kinda lackluster after a while. The game also suffers from some get stuck in enviromental issues and "i cant jump over this little rock" syndrome. And all the oh so tedious "sidequests" that are all the same, explore some ? with the same mobs in all of them, loot come crappy item that you dont need and repeat.Its like doing the most boring part of Witcher 3 all over again, but even more boring. The English translation is also cinrgeworthy, with Americans talking in "russian" accent.How hard could it be to actually get real Russians speaking english doing the voices? The game looks nice, but looking nice is far from enough.

Игра крайне отличная - интересный мир для исследования, графика, сюжет, геймплей, атмосфера, крафт на ходу, управление, персонажи, музыкальное сопровождение, крайне малое количество багов и т.д. Минусы? - плохая оптимизация, эпик стор и иногда пролетающий через врагов нож))). Крайне отличное завершение(надеюсь что будут и дальше игры) серии Метро!А про русофобию - полная чушь
Muy bueno, si te gusta el genero o has jugado los anteriores metro este es indispensable.

Так, и кто там кукарекает про неоптимизацию, так вот, можете лососнуть тунца! на FX-8350 и R9 380 ИДЁТ на ВЫСОКИХ 50-60 fps. А то что у кого то там на 1070 лагает, и всё такое - у друга Ryzen 5 1600x и 1060 6gb - идет на ультрах 60 fps, при минимальных проседаниях в районе 3-4 фпс. А потом поиграйте в FC 5, где графика убогая. И на счёт НПС кто то что то говорил. в фаркрае по голове можно ходить неписям. а ставить 0 за то что игра видете ли на вашем ПЕКА тормозит, и вышла не в стиме - идите лесом. не надо обсирать игру не поиграв и не пройдя её.

The game was made for consoles that is what i don't like (no recoil on guns, clunky movement more then last two games, buggy areas here and there) but AI feels like an improvement in some aspects, human AI can now one shot you on hardest difficulty but animal AI is worse, not aggressive enough to make it challenging for PC players. Game felt clunky at start but got better after Volga level after i got used to it. It has still good things that made Metro great, the desert level is very atmospheric and blew me away in many things, the looks, the feel of driving that wrecked car, hidden places where you can find loot, some riddles where you get upgrades, moral deeds and in turn getting upgrades from villagers, big sand storm that makes place very dark and forces you to use gas mask because of contamination etc. All in all a good game so far but needs some polish through patches to make it less buggy/clunky.

Атмосфера 10/10Геймплей 8/10 (если забить на врагов, которые либо не видят тебя в плотную, либо видят сквозь стены и малипусенькие щели)Графика 9/10Оптимизация 4/10Средняя арифметическая 10/10 (все логично)
Good job 4A Games

column1: Metro Exodus so nice game but bad ending is really bad

Review: I have to say giving this a number rating of only 9 is upsetting and would give it a 10. but sometimes I want to just rate it at a 7. let me start by saying this game is really fun. though I cant stop but feel like the devs missed some very important aspects. in the metros, every place is packed full and each corner and shadow has its own unique aspect to it. though in the waste land you visually don't see copy and paste no, you don't, but you do FEEL it inside; at least for me. on the bright side there sure was plenty of dialog and personality added to each npc. you actually have to hunt down the dialog in order to get the whole story. to continue sadly, in exodus you no longer need to hunt down these safe keys which could actually mean life or death (wasting 2 hour on a chapter cus you never found the red key to a safe that has a 30 second filter that would save your life and also ammo) the key's were a very fun up lifting moment when you only have 2 rounds of ammo in your bastard rifle and only 25 military rounds for your Kalash.. the meaning of life and fear of not having enough military grade ammo to re stock, when you have to choose to live now and die later or kick ass with only a few throwing knives against a herd of beasts in the metros.  the challenge of always needing to watch your actions is nullified when engaging bandits you never have to ask if you have enough ammo or health. in exodus you don't have a challenge, the challenge is knocking out each enemy and to hear the dialog of every npc. that's the challenge in the game not the fighting. the open world is ok and I would give it an A, but I really do miss the metro stations im sorry, but I do.....

Пожалуй лучшая часть серии. Цепляющая история, харизматичные персонажи, приятные нововведения по типу крафта и полуоткрытых локаций. Атмосфера хоть и не такая как в первых двух частях, но все же это «Метро». Основной сюжет, истории фракций и их становление, маленькие история сторонних персонажей, записки и аудиозаписи, всё это погружает тебя в этот мир с головой и заставляет переживать за него. Финал игры дарит бурю эмоций, а после прохождения долгое приятное послевкусие.Из минусов отметил бы только баги, было встречено за 30 с лишним часов не так много, но некоторые из них мешали прохождению.Для сомневающихся фанатов старых частей, однозначно рекомендуется к покупке. А для новых игроков это хорошая возможность познакомиться со вселенной «Метро 2033».

True score: 8 points out of 10, 10 points are put solely to support the game because of the moral freaks putting this game negative scores just because it came out in the Epic Store.This game has everything you need:+(x 2) Amazing story,+(x 2) Beautiful and atmospheric scenery,+ Acceptable gameplay, not much forcing bored and diluted with different inserts and tasks,+ Perfectly spelled out secondary characters and more in this area,+ Relative(in a positive way) the diversity of types of enemies.However, everything has flaws and in this game they are highlighted in different aspects in different ways:- Not a great optimization, which is built on a bit outdated, but brought to mind the engine,- (x 0.5) relative (in a bad sense) void on locations,- (x 0.5) Bad AI in people-opponents in open locations, in any other places good, almost no lagging AI,- Unsuccessful attempt to introduce modern trends of survival in the open world,- Bugs and lags, sometimes affecting the gameplay.Result: 7 positive qualities, 3 of them-the main features of the genre of this game.4 negative qualities, 1 of them(with a 0.5 negative points) - the main feature of the genre, and 1 apply in full to the technical part of the game.In this assessment should take into account all factors, as well as the game has met the expectations of fans, has an adequate assessment and quality for casual gamers, its assessment should be at least 8 points on the criteria of its genre.

Этот поезд в огне,И нам не на что больше жать.Этот поезд в огне,И нам некуда больше бежать.Эта земля была нашей,Пока мы не увязли в борьбе,Она умрет, если будет ничьей.Пора вернуть эту землю себе. Игра очень прекрасная,жалко что не в стиме правда(Как по мне ее очень растянули,но сюжет это просто что-то нечто.Я прошел на хорошую концовку,пустил слезу,Мельникова очень жаль.Посмотрел на плохую концовку-зарыдал.Как по мне лучшая игра за этот год,и лучшая игра от наших разработчиков,хоть я и с Казахстана,но считаю что 4A Games НАШИ разработчики.Спасибо,вам,4A Games,за такую прекрасную игру.Просто спасибо....

Metro Exodus builds on the best parts of the first two games, and adds a lot of new stuff to it. As always, the story and gameplay is great, the music is amazing too. The characters bring a lot of emotion to the table, and the addition of the open-world aspect is awesome. Like all Metro games, the last chapter is an incredibly wild ride. The trilogy reaches its culmination and feels like it finally paid off. My one gripe with the game is that the taiga chapter feels very linear, although the last chapter is pretty linear too, but packed with lots of story elements. Overall, the game felt very fun to play and I eagerly await any DLC they release for this game. Choosing to make it an Epic Store exclusive was somewhat of a bad decision, but it doesn't take away from the game at all. 4A Games did an amazing job with the game, and it shouldn't be rated badly because of a decision their publisher made.

Игра конечно же не идеальна, но это всё то же Метро, хоть и на поверхности (хотя первый и последний уровни дают снова почувствовать страх подземных туннелей). Однако игра очень атмосферная. Сюжет вышел добротным, довольно интригующим. Персонажи прописаны отлично, запомнился каждый из экипажа Авроры. Неплохие локации, в частности понравились Ямантау (эта локация с её обитателями неслабо так меня ужаснула), Тайга и Новосибирск, который вышел, как мне кажется, мрачнее Москвы. Игра неплохо шла на средних настройках на системе AMD FX-6300 (не разогнанном), 8 Gb оперативы и GTX 1050. Из минусов конечно выделю техническую часть, а именно баги, из-за одного даже пришлось просить чужой сейв, чтобы играть дальше, ибо проходить главу с самого начала очень не хотелось (играл еще в непропатченную версию, поэтому насчет багфиксов не могу быть уверен). Звук местами паршивый, часто голоса слышны намного хуже окружения, нередко бывает трудно определить местоположение врага (особенно проявилось на Волге). Ну и глуповатый ИИ. Концовка очень задела душу, что однозначно огромный плюс.

Very immersive and great graphics. Have had none of the minor bugs people complain about and the game runs faster than early reviews suggest, good results even at maxed out settings including ray tracing turned on (i5 8400 / 2060). As for saves - not sure about console but on PC you get a manual save intended to be used at safe spots in addition to the autosave so no problems there.  Also the butt-hurt steam user whining about Epic exclusivity are amusing considering how many games on the Steam store are exclusive to Steam only.

If a single-player game makes me ragequit, then it's a **** game. I played the 1.007 version, a year after it was released on PC, i haven't encountered any major game-breaking bugs or frame-rate issues. but the game itself just sucks. Four things that completely annoyed the hell out of me: - Horrible sound/npc design. I was hoping that my companions would shoot themselves in the mouth so they could finally shut up talking. and in overall, the game sounds like a convuluted mess. - Irritating cutscenes, especially in the beginning of the game, completely put my mind out of the game because you're not in control for half of the time. - Wrong sense of helplessness, i had no idea what i should do, or where i should go to, especially early in the game, and had to reload a lot of times after getting shot to hell (and the ludicrous one-slot save system doesn't help) - After i melee-attacked a humanimal it went down and it got back up, i melee-attacked it again, and it got back up. repeated that FOR 80 TIMES until i gave up and i was killed by it. I just couldn't help myself from bursting out in laughter and disbelief and almost destroying my keyboard by smashing ALT+F4 I wonder how this game ever passed any playtest and Q&A department, my guess is that those people are too dumb to tie their own shoelaces.

The GOOD:- Metro Exodus has very good graphics. You should play this game in Windows 10. In Windows 7, it still works great, but it doesn't have ray tracing.- I like the backpack system. But the crafting system is abused and poorly executed.- Ranger mode is the way it is meant to be played, but this has bad and unexpected setbacks.- The firearm sounds have improved.- Available in GOG, which is great, but still came 1 year after EPIC store exclusivity. The BAD:- The game has become a semi-open world adventure compared to the claustrophobic tunnels of previous games. And sadly, it has been executed poorly. It has a very predictable story and very bad writing. The developers were very good at FPS games, but not with RPG-style open world games and it shows very clearly.- EPIC exclusivity on the first year of release is BAD for everyone as it divides the fan base.- The game is full of ridiculous fetch quests and other stupid tasks with Artyom being a "silent protagonist". Artyom talks on loading screens but not during the actual game. WTF?! This makes the game VERY awkward as strangers you meet for the first time will very quickly tell you their WHOLE life story and regrets without your character saying anything or even introducing himself. Then after that massive expo dump, the characters you meet will quickly give you quests. I still can't believe that a kid asked me to get his teddy bear or a woman asked me to get a picture of her mother. Getting those things made me fight so many monsters and people. If someone asked me to kill so many to get their teddy bear in real life, I would shoot them right away.- The Ranger mode is very poorly executed for people who played it for the first time in ranger because the game removed all UI, even menus to select grenades or operate the radio while in the Aurora. It was very stupid having to explore buttons just to stand up from the radio table because the UI was invisible.- The crafting system was abused to the point of laziness. ALL merchants have been removed from the game which is very immersion breaking. Also Artyom mostly gets crafting materials. It's very wrong to see huge links of live ammunition and crafting materials in a table and when you hit "E" Artyom ignores the ammo and just gets the crafting materials. The game lets you craft everything except guns. This was clearly done as a LAZY alternative to come up with a currency and merchant stores. It was very bad and feels lazy. How can the world be short of anything when anybody can just craft ammo from commonly available materials?- The guns become dirty overtime, but they become dirty VERY quickly. It's like you cover them in mud after a few uses or if you fall in a swamp of water. That's now how this works in real life.- The characters are very POORLY WRITTEN. Everybody is just there to give you quests. There are so many Spartans but they all just guard the train with Artyom having to do EVERYTHING. This feels very stupid. Anna calls you "My Love" all the time. This feels so unlike her and very cheesy. You can tell she is going to die because the game tries so hard to force you to have an emotional connection with her. It is so unnatural.- The gun customization is VERY lazy and allows you to turn your assault rifle into a sniper rifle or submachinegun in just a few seconds. This is ridiculous and not how it works in real life. You need a gunsmith for this and proper tools and this takes lots of effort and time. You can't just do it with a backpack. It's very lazy, as this was just done to eliminate gun merchants.- There are no merchants in the game and no currency. Gone are the signature Military Grade Rounds. So much for post-apocalyptic immersion. This is a theme park dressed like Metro!- The enemies are very predictable one-dimensional Mad Max-style despots. And the game added ZOMBIES (called humanimals). Metro doesn't need zombies, but let's add lazy cliches and uncreative enemies for the walking dead fans, complete with crossbow.- The whole story is very stupid. You can tell they ran out of book material. After the dark ones, they just make all kinds of bad decisions on where to go on the train. Funny thing here is, if they want a peaceful place, there are so many nice spots you pass by while travelling, but everyone just ignores it. They have to pick a place heavily infested by bandits, radiation and monsters. What were they thinking?! This writing is very unMetro-like.- If you played the Metro 2033 and Last Light, you will definitely feel the loss of quality with this game. It's just a cheap attempt to turn Metro into a Borderlands or Stalker clone.

The game feels like a downgrade in fun for an upgrade in graphics. It's slow and clunky, extremely so, where the character moves like its waddling through jelly. The fact that so many actions are "press [E] to" just makes it a lot more boring. Quite often i see an area i wanna go into and gotta slow down for the prompt, press the key, slowly crawl to the other side just to pick two components and have to repeat the same. But it gets worse when it comes to more cinematic-y stuff. Walking by the coast? sudden mutant jumps out and we are now in cinematic quick time event spam [E]. Im on a boat and suddenly notice my input does nothing? here comes the monster smash. There are so many instances of the game playing itself and at times if you are "lucky" you get to repeatedly push a key. On the other hand, where it'd be nice to have your character locked is in dialogues but nope, they decided to let you free so you have the option to walk away but basically cant (if you want to learn anything that is) but the trick? that often other people also talk to you or on the side so you cannot get what they are saying (and if you wanted to play it in russian with subtitles, say goodbye to subtitles working in any way, at times they even break when there's only one person talking...). The parts when you finally get to play in between small quick time events or large first person (at times slow and clunky) cinematics, dont feel too compelling either. If you want stealth there are way better options including the previous two games (even if they had their issues, still better) because here there is SO much light and cover means **** so even if you only peek a little, an enemy multiple meters away will be alerted in an instant. If you like action on the other hand, i've ran into a couple invisible walls where the enemy wouldnt flinch but he could shoot back, tho they seem to be able to shrug off shots from a rifle somewhat easily, and of course they can shoot for hours but once you kill them and loot them, they'll have like 6 or 7 bullets. I've found myself leaving an encounter with less bullets and medkits than i started it with. Story wise? so far it's rather meh and i am struggling to feel compelled to continue. Anna's entire character is being overly attached and constantly being "oh my love!!!". Her dad is just grumpy for the sake of grumpy and the rest of the initial cast is generic bravado goofball soldier going "har har boobs". The atmosphere as far as i've seen is not that great either, i wonder why keep calling it Metro. This feels more like a less compelling version of Stalker. Seems like they wanted to add random elements from the Ubisoft sandbox formula, poorly, while keeping some of the crappiest parts of the Metro system (inventory and UI, and seriously don't start with the "muh realism" because then we have truckloads of prompts with floating [E] icons and other **** and lets not talk about the 'oh, your dogtag stopped the bullet!' cringy as hell moment).

Artjom not talking-1Other people talking and the dialogues are ridiculous. An 8 year might be proud to write such a  story but i guess they had at least one adult involved and even if you are on drugs or vodka all the time i cannot believe how bad this was done. I begin to think, thanks for Artjom not talking because anything he could say would probably annoy me some more.-2Monster respawn is to much too quick and similar believable as the dialogues.-1A hidden moral system where you are not allowed to shoot anyone shooting at you.-1Had to do a chapter restart 3 times because of the same game breaking and well known bug and finally uninstalled this piece of ****-5

As a longtime fan of the Metro games, I have to say that this was my least favorite entry in the series.  The story is good, and as a final game it wraps up the trilogy well.  The graphics are mostly very nice, but oddly there are some areas and/or textures that are out of place and very muddy-looking or low-res when compared with the rest of the game.  It seems fairly well optimized as my Ryzen 7 and GTX 1070 average over 100FPS at a mix of high and medium settings @ 1080p.  My main issue with this game is the bugs.  In the course of playing this game I was subjected to countless bugs, glitches, freezes and crashes.  From assets floating in mid air to creatures forgetting to be hostile to you and shuffling around in circles en masse while you walk into them.  Allies clip right through walls and my player has gotten physically stuck in obstacles in the map on several occasions.  I have had numerous crashes, and was even rewarded for finishing the game by a crash to desktop immediately at the end of the credits.  It feels to me that this game was rushed to market as it just doesn't have the smoothness or polish of a finished game.  This is only made worse by the reputation of the developers based on the previous two games.  All the bugs (I finished the game in two weeks and I did not have a single bug-free or glitch-free session) really just break the immersion and drag me out of the world of the Metro.  It left a bittersweet taste in my mouth as I really wanted to love this game but just couldn't get past the technical issues. 6/10

Feels more like a cheap indie game made by a couple of students than an AA full price game. I am quite happy that it is included in xbox game pass for pc. So at least I did not loose any money on this trash.
mal optimizado y el juego se crashea todo el tiempo( tengo una rtx 2070) y cuando me refiero a que se crashea es que el juego se congela con mi computadora y no puedo hacer nada es muy constante.

Для меня это "Игра Года" Отличное продолжение моей любимой серии игры.Сюжет лучше чем в прошлых сериях, но не без недостатков. Графика отличная, но я не могу ей дать 10 баллов. Очень много пустых локаций, которые сильно бросаются в глаза. Музыка очень душевная, не душная Общая оценка 9 из 10

I think the game deserves a 8, but because the bad reviews, I give it a 10. This is a must buy, but that is only my opinion.

Очень личное (в народном смысле) и превосходное произведение, которым не стыдно гордится. Очень впечатлило как были переданы элементы культуры, языковые особенности и черты характера персонажей. У меня такое чувство, что мы каждый день сталкиваемся с похожими людьми из команды Артема.Игра очень достойная, а негативные оценки ставили какие-то гастролеры, мля-я.

edit: I've decided to play the whole thing again on hardcore ranger difficulty level (first playthrough was on normal) just to see if I am missing something. The gameplay is not very different, but it made me revise my score down significantly. The reason: this games punishes you severely for playing it ANY OTHER WAY than SJW developers intended, by  killing off your NPC teammates and ultimately you, the protagonist. Enough said, this garbage is now uninstalled and I doubt very much that I will buy another game from this studio. I am kinda glad that this game released on epic crap store first. Bought it on steam for $30 and even that is too much for this one, I think the fair value would be about $15.But anyway. Lets talk about the good first.Visuals: the game looks great and runs well. I don't have an RTX card, just an old 1080TI at 1440p resolution and everything looked drop dead gorgeous, with exception of desert map where it started to chug quite a bit. Weapons looked great and so did characters. Some of character animations were a bit dicey though.Setting: I really liked the idea of a train as a moving, upgradeable home base. That was pretty dope, really hoping someone will take that idea to the next level, with a better game.The second half of the very last map, Novosibirsk, was just damn awesome. Gave me massive Stalker flashbacks and I loved it. Now on to the parts that were bleh.Sound: nothing special, really.  Solid middle.Map design: uninspiring at best. There were some really pretty parts but the gameplay  was kinda tepid. Like previous Metro games, the maps are extremely linear, even the more open ones.Enemy and friendly AI: absolutely rudimentary and generally a detriment to the game.Crafting and inventory management: I was not put off by it but didn't enjoy it all that much either. Now the parts that sucked some really smelly Ukrainian ass:Plot/story: I thought this was just the worst. There are no redeeming qualities here, it's just garbage throughout -  especially because so much potential (the "Great Train Adventure" premise) had been squandered by a nonsensical plot. You can't built anything decent on a rotten foundation, so all the good elements of this title fall flat because of the extra-stupid story.Voiceover: easily the worst part of the game. With VERY FEW exceptions, voice acting was beyond bad, this is just high-school theater level of bad. And there's A LOT of talking in this title. Conclusion: worth picking up for $15-20, but don't expect the level of quality of previous Metro games. All good things eventually come to end, and this is the end of of Metro franchise; I am extremely skeptical that it can be salvaged after this uninspired turd.The anti-consumer decision to release exclusively on Epic also affected my rating.

Не могу судить игру в рамках серии игр метро, но как самостоятельная игра мне она сильно зашла. Хорошая атмосфера, неплохая оптимизация, интересные диалоги. Разве что немой Артём бесил когда ему вроде бы прямой вопрос задают а он молчит.

The game is awesome in all way-around, but sound. Sound sucks at most. And the reason is that developers were too greedy to put some effort in producing new samples and QA that afterwards. Some of sound presets were taken from previous parts. Voices are unsynced and have huge pauses in between characters talk. The same method used in old-fashioned games, but this does not fit in Exdodus. At least it should not.Footsteps are bugging most. How QA team (if any) accepted that? You can hear a dozen steps just by pushing W for a second. it's like a character has 10 feet, not less.

Low score here - because of bugs. Don't look at them. At all.- Bugs are fully random, somebody could get a lot, somebody could get any of them. 4A will cope with them though. Saying not about bugs - game is perfect. Just play it.

Metro Exodus is an amazing game. Like the rest of the franchise it shines for the atmosphere and the feeling of “density” in the air thanks to particles and light effects but this time developers have created a beautiful open world for us to enjoy also. The graphics in this game are the best to the date there is no video game in the history of videogames that gets even close to the visual quality of this Metro, of course this will be more noticeable in a high end PC at higher resolutions and settings but still if you have a mid-range PC the game will blow you away in this aspect.As many people have said the AI feels week and you will encounter some bugs (non critical ones) during the adventure so be ready for that but for the rest this game is a masterpiece.Be sure to take your time and enjoy all the corners and secrets that this game has to offer.

This is an excllent game.It does have some technical issues.  I myself experienced a game breaking issue and lost over an hour of gameplay. Even with that, I feel like it is a satisfying entry in the metro series. Main things to consider:* Story is great* Graphics are excellent* This is a fully immersive game where you are rewarded for exploring and experiencing the game on your own terms Plus, imagine i bought a game that doesnt want me to get my wallet out to buy a better weapon or a **** reticle. I was able to play the full game without another dime. Overall i cant recommend this game enough. minus one point for the technical issues. 9/10

Review: I like the atmosphere and a lot of the details in the environment, but after beating the game I feel a bit disappointed. I ran into several very frustrating glitches. The cut scenes are often very slow and drawn out. Sometimes you need to follow somebody who also moves extremely slowly. There was one part where the guy kept telling me to hurry up, but I was constantly waiting for him. Some parts of the game are very difficult to figure out, not in a fun way. It seems to go back and forth between being too easy and too hard. I didn't find the story all that interesting. I give it a 6.5. I wasn't sad when the game was over. I actually felt kind of relieved and uninstalled it right away.

I've just finished the game and apart from the bugs(Yeah, they really bother sometimes) the game is INCREDIBLE!!! The visuals and the lenght of the game surprised me, all the lore, the stories of fallen soldiers, the fear i had  of going to radioactive sites, I've to admit the imersion the game has brought was outstanding and after 20hrs of gameplay I say it was worth every single penny spent in this masterpiece!!

Игра проста великолепна!Подобранные треки очень сильно передают атмосферу,особенно в конце.В игре было очень много красивых декораций, но были и дешёвые на которые видимо време особо не уделяли.Если бы разработчики не перенесли игру в Epick Games Store то оценки пользователей были бы лучше,а так игра была не хуже прошлых

Metro EXODUS. Как много это для меня значило, ведь серия игр метро моя любимая серия игр. Но после релиза я столкнулся с несколькими проблемами из-за которых игре можно поставить 5 баллов. Кто то скажет,-"Эй, но ты поставил 8 баллов!", да, это так, но об этом в конце. Начну разбор игры с одного из самых главных составляющих игры: графика. В целом графон тянет на 6-7 баллов из-за ужасной оптимизации (если она вообще есть) и в целом далеко не самой плохой картинки, даже не на максимальных настройках. Теперь плавно переходим к ещё одной основной части этой игры: сюжет. Он тут есть и, в целом, тянет не на 10 а на восемь баллов только из-за некоторых костылей, вроде переговоров людоеда из Ямантау и Мельника, в котором голос первого звучит не как у регулярного военного а как у маньяка, и ведь всем на это наплевать. Третье: озвучка и анимации. Озвучка вышла на редкость хорошей, но вот анимации ужасные, а ГГ и вовсе молчит. Слова не поподают в губы а жестикуляция как у итальянца под адреналином. Где то 4 из 10 только за неплохую озвучку. Четвёртое: атмосфера. Многим не понравился открытый мир, об этом дальше, но мне понравился выход из тёмных пещер в ужасающие пустоши России 9 из 10. А теперь геймплей. В новой части метро попытались сделать открытый мир и выйти на поверхность, что получилось довольно хорошо, но, к сожалению, локации получились хоть и большими, но пустыми, а третья локация стала вообще одним небольшим коридором, хотя на неё я возлагал большие надежды 5 из 10. Ну а вот и заключение. Игра получилась средней, особенно учитывая то, что она продавалась за фулл прайс 2к рублей за обычное, или 3к за золотое издание. 4a games, надо соответствовать ценнику, ведь в релиз я бы не отдал за данную игру и 1.5к рублей. А теперь вот ответ, почему я поставил иге 8 а не 5 баллов? Ребята из 4a games одни из малочисленных разработчиков игр в странах СНГ и их проект стал одним из самых лучших выпущенных на Руси. Поэтому я даю вам несколько баллов авансом, потому что верю, что ваши проекты могут быть гораздо лучше и рассчитываю на это. Ну вот и кончился мой обзор, целую щёчки, жму сосочки, удачи в игропроме, 4a games!

Дальше , зачем  было добавлять странную механику "выживания" с патронами, это уже и не шутер и еще не выживалка.Игра такое ощущение что сделана на 1/3  ибо полноценных локаций две , это волга и каспий.
