Чем тратить огромную кучу времени и денег на открытый мир, лучше бы сделали качественный, линейный шутер. Надеюсь это идея издателя, а не разработчика.Из плюсов:- Графика. Дизайн отличные.- Поездка на поезде.- Очень прикольный AI.Все.Консольные уши торчат изо всех щелей. Объясните разработчикам, что FOV в PC играх обычно не меньше 65. А наличие 104 кнопок на клавиатуре, не означает, что надо их все задействовать и разбрасывать. Что молчаливый герой это нихрена не круто. Что битвы с боссом, завязанные на скриптах это отстой. Что плюющие противники этой самый раздражающий элемент игры.Критические и очень серьёзные баги, которые до сих пор не пофиксили. До сих пор!! Я из-за них тупо не могу играть дальше они сохраняться. А эти дауны не сделали ручное сохраните в нескольких файлах. Пришлось качать сохранения и запускать следующую главу. Потому что игра в итоге повредила все сохранения.Всратая история и атмосфера. Мир теперь выглядит как вселенная Mad Max. Ничего общего с постсоветским пространством. Отвратительное и нелогичное управление. Неудобная навигация. Чуваки стреляющие на 1.5 километра без прицела это конечно дно. Если противник не может тебя достать, он плюется, кидается и т.д. это уж совсем откравенная халтура. Иногда при загрузке сохранения, неожиданно начинается сирена.В целом ощущается, будто разработчики просрали сроки разработки.

I really good game, I recommend everyone tries it out! It took me a while to get into it because I felt that the dialog was cliched and voiceovers were not great, but over time the characters all grew on me. Now I am hooked. I have never played or read any of the previous books and books, but now I definitely will. The gameplay has some elements that are similar to the newer Deus Ex games, like the option to play stealthily with lethal/non-lethal takedowns, which I have really enjoyed.

A great game with a few flaws.  The open world concept is an interesting introduction to the metro series, and is refreshing, but comes with some gameplay annoyances.  The open world itself distracts from the game, and there often isn't all that many interesting points about it to make it worth while.  Besides this, the crafting system is also a little bit silly, and the stealth aspect of the game seems half-baked at best, and outright buggy at worst.  The moral system is still as annoying as the previous game, and unfortunately, has too much of an influence on the ending. With all these points out of the way, Metro Exodus does make up for these flaws with excellent story telling, and with character development that is second to none.  It is a brilliant story-driven narrative that wraps up the metro series nicely.  There are few games out there that had me as immersed into the world as this one, and I would almost dare saying that the narrative here is among the best in gaming.  Combined with stellar graphics and sounds to boot, this is still a game that is worth playing.

Metro Exodus... Yeah...what can I say. I did not like it. I did not like 1st Metro, I really, really liked Metro number 2 and had high hopes for this game. Game failed to impress me. It is so odd because overall it is a good game and it has all the ingredients of the instant classic but these ingredients are not mixed well and the whole game level design, characters and voice acting are just uninspiring. It all feels just bland, rushed at times and so, so average. Lets start with positives. Game looks good, some locations can look spectacular but others are just good. I would say that it probably is the best looking Metro game in the whole franchise. Shooting is ok, it is nothing special. Headshoting enemies is ok, always go for the headshot to conserve precious ammo. Here is one of the main problems of the game. It's design. Game forces you to do non-lethal walkethrough and to use stealth as much as you can. The problem is that stealth mechanics are clunky and AI is almost breain dead so stealth is boring and you will intentionally go loud just for variety. Game also fails to give you a proper choice of how to approach the level. If you are spotted AI will start shooting at you, if you respond with violence kiss that good ending goodbye. You will not even know that by playing the game you want you will be penalized. On my walkethrough I did not kill any of the enemies who tried to surrender. I knocked everyone out and spared all slaves but hey, surprise, surprise I got bad ending. Like WTF? This does not make any sense !!! Game choices are sooo poorly designed, you do not even know that what you are doing might negatively affect the game's ending. It is so poorly designed and so poorly telegraphed to the player. SOme dialogue option and some moments clearly defined moments and dilemmas to choose would have been so much better. Do not even start me on voice acting. It is atrocious. I have found characters so irritating, their voices so bad, old colonel, Anna's father in particular. It was awful design choice and game would be so much better with original voice acting. There was this moment in game when one of the Spartans played guitar and sang in Russian. It was beautiful and so much better fitting than some awful english voice acting. Pretend russian accent spoken in english. awful, atrocious. No, I did not like it at all ! Do not even get me started on the way developer used cut scenes. It is awful. In every big moment of the game you are not allowed to look where you want, you are not allowed to do anything, you are just passively observing and it so utterly boring. The all cool stuff, culmination of the whole level is presented to you with lazy ingame cutscene with super limited interaction - namely spamming of E button. The camera and all this cool stuff is watched not played. Game feels rushed, last two locations are much, much smaller in size. More linear and after interesting semi open world presented to us in first two locations game becomes more linear and ultimately fails its endevours of becoming the best in the series. I would place it somewhere above 1 and below 3. Not a dent on fallout series or any other open world game. Pros:- graphics- setting Cons:- semi open world does now work- tons of bugs- voice acting.- awful AI- uninspiring story- clunky stealthy mechanics- confusing morale code

The movement is this game is a joke. You have to travel large distances and can only move as fast as a fast walk. Not to mention your charscter get stuck on stuff. It a pretty game thats badly designed. There no direction and lock on your progress everywhere with no hints.. Gun feel weak and unsatifying, not that you use them ofyen and stealth is a joke. The gamma is messed up so you cant see a thing without a light and if you use a light you get shoot , cause tje enemy sees you..

Exodus appears to have significant technical issues even in 2020. Audio has significant problems with relative dialogue/volume and the spatial simulation of sound.  Enemies who are 100 metres away sound like they are inches away, and you have to keep turning your head to try and triangulate a source of noise. Dialogue audio is extremely poor as well, with random volumes at random distances and directions. Some people claim to have mitigated this by toggling a spatial sound setting in-game. I have had no success there, but using headphones has helped somewhat.The maps themselves experience significant clipping problems with the protagonist passing through solid objects at times. Enemies unfortunately do this a lot more, both before and after they are shot, breaking immersion. They also have tendency to shudder and shake once dead.Looking through the binoculars or scopes will reveal significant texture pop-in issues, as well as weird stop-motion animation at a distance.Weapon customisation is an interesting feature, and somewhat makes up for the limited variety of weapons.Like the previous Metro games, the background world's artwork is very good. The painted dysoptian world feels both real and plausible. The designs of both urban ruins and the wilderness have been well thought out against the human disaster that precedes all the metro games.Overall, it feels like mishmash of good literary ideas/artwork and poor technical execution.Grab it on sale, and make sure you play it after the first two Metro games.

Pros+ Artistic design from little items to interiors to landscape is breathtaking.+ Graphics and scaling is real good (able to run the game with 1070 at higher details)+ Ray Tracing (adds extra quality)+ Metro universe is captivating Cons-Poor storytelling, weak, sloppy and predictable plot structure- Mute character limits, in fact, kills the dialogue option with any other character and you have to endure long even longer monologues. simply can't understand that why is that Artyom dude had to be MUTE!- Some campaign areas richer contentwise compared to others and some feel lacking- AI is literally dead. dead as dirt! Average game / 6 out of 10( wait for a proper discount and don't pay it full price. weak narrative and lack of content kills it)- Who the hell is responsible for that one save slot decision for the love god!
Gameplay : 7
Absolutely loved this game. Great scenery, good story and fun combat. Kinda sad once I beat it, as there's very few other games that make me feel so immersed..
tense, great ambience, decent mechanics.not in love with the shooting and the story sometimes a bit too kitschy.
Solid story, great graphics, very good characters animations and character interactions scenes. Engaging. Hoping for a sequel.

Much of the of the potential of this series has been wasted. Don't misunderstand me, the graphics are great, the combat is intense... especially the desert level is extremely well designed. But the rest feels generic. You won't waste your money on this game, but don't expect too much.

With all the hub bub about the epic store I thought this must be an amazing game. The story is awful, the acting is atrocious, the level design is wtf, the bugs are in your face within seconds...I just don't get it...this is a bad game...epic store did y'all a favor...
Metro Exodus stumbles frequently in the first half of the playthrough, but eventually gets better as it slowly returns to the series' linearity with the help of a magnificent soundtrack.

For me, it is just a few games that could provide such an amazing mix of native atmosphere, warm feeling of a cohesive unit that seeks a way to survive in spite of everything and wide variety of truly breath taking locations.And it is very sad, and very disappointing, that negative reviews that driven not by the game itself, but by distributor (Epic ) are influenced on overall game score. By my opinion there should be an option to point the reason behind your score in order for other users could clear total score for non game related issues (and more, may be even to exclude bug driven scores or political influences, as for all of this could be fixed later on or not related to the game itself)

One of the best fps single player i play long time,not only is another metro like its the best metro .The last one i enjoy so mush was crysys 1 and Bioshock.This is a masterpiece , you want play and find always a bit more, good story, weaponds are fantastic give you a good feeling, the ai is very challange,the open world its amazing impossible to not love it. I have 0 issius even on ultra game is so fluid i lock the 60fps since isnt need more dont know how-players have problems  *i7 4790k GTX 980 TI here* - Best FPS in years well done -

It's a great end to the trilogy of metro games. It's fleshed out systems and great core combat are brought into a more open and semi-linear setting. The writing and characters are well realised with good acting to keep me invested. The tone is nicely controlled, never veering off course as the tension and fear slowly build up across the game. The music is kept in control with great sound design across the board, helping bring life to the environment. Some of the sections are kinda slow and force you to wait, and honestly I still think the stealth is a bit too forced if you want to get the good karma ending. Aside from that as a fan of the books and the games is a good ending to the franchise for now.

Había cierto estepticismo cuando empezó a verse que la tercera y última entrega sería un mundo abierto. Reconozco que al principio podía verse con malos ojos si iba a tratarse del típico mundo completista donde prima la cantidad sobre la calidad, pero nada más lejos de la realidad. Si bien hay claros altibajos, lo cierto es que al final han optado por la forma que mejor podía quedarle de mundo semiabierto. Y es que para mantener la calidad, es necesario centrarse en pequeños espacios abiertos, conectados por momentos lineales donde avanza la trama. Es algo que me encantó en su día en The Witcher 2 y que aquí veo una buena similitud en cuanto a ritmo y presentación. Por todo lo demás, el juego es bastante continuista en sus puntos fuertes y debiles con Metro 2033 y Metro Last Light. Y en general los puntos fuertes siempre tienen grandes peros. Por ejemplo, es indudable que el aspecto visual es imponente. El juego de luces, de efectos y de texturas sigue una buena evolución de las dos entregas anteriores. Pero ello choca con un sistema de animaciones algo tosco y con grandes bugs, efectos visuales extraños que no sabes si son de mala calidad o se trata de glitches puntuales. Puedes estar en una conversación con otro personaje en primer plano y todo es perfecto, solo que de repente alguien roza un plato y se produce una explosion que lo teletransporta, o alguien se queda atascado en una pared, alguien dispara de fondo pero falta el sonido del arma... cosas así. Aunque el resultado es notable, los momentos donde algo te saca de la experiencia son abundantes. Pero si algo funciona en este juego por encima de todo y de todos. Algo que es la total novedad de Exodus, es la Aurora. El tren que será parte imprescindible del viaje, hogar y a la vez personaje principal entre todo el grupo de personas, no solo es una solución visual. La interacción con la Aurora es bastante similar a lo que sucedía con los campamentos de Red Dead Redemption 2. Quizá la obsesion por el detalle y las posibilidades no sean las mismas, pero la sensación que deja es muy similar. Sin duda lo mejor de la entrega.
Хорошая игра, очень эмоцианальная и красивая. Очень понравилась.
Great game the graphics are stunning and the story is well presented. But the game was a little short there aren't many things to do and you can complete it very fast.
Story 5/10

Its quite a buggy game that can put a stain on what is otherwise a good experience. Some of bugs that really annoyed me was that at times the actions on my keyboard didn't register. For example, for a whole chapter I was unable to close my map with the default tab key. Then the next chapter I was able to do it again. During these moments you just end up smashing and clicking everything until something happens. It was really annoying. AI randomly popping in and out during scenes. One time a bunch of mutants looked like they were swimming through the air. AI in general felt weird and just not fluid enough. They will get stuck in places or just not fit through a hole because its 2 cm too small. These things really spoil the immersion. Apart from that, the game looks really, really good. Some levels just left me in awe. The art style is just gorgeous. World, characters and weapons are really nice to look at. One mission where I didn't like the characters or the world was at the Yamantau Bunker...everything there just seemed that it would have been better left out of the game. When it comes to gameplay mechanics, it doesn't feel polished like you would think a AAA game should be and I really wished they also payed more attention to this aspect of the game. Shooting feels fine, but movement and fighting with the enemies just was not satisfying enough. It felt like it was more meant to be played with stealth in mind, which I also found more fun in the end. Its not a polished high action packed shooter like doom or call of duty, but its more story driven than those titles and at times, it can really nail immersion better than most games. It could have been an 8 or even a 9, but unfortunately some bugs and clunky AI keep it from reaching its full potential. If you enjoy post apocalyptic fiction and game immersion, then this is definitely a game you should play. If you want a smooth polished call of duty like shooter, then this is not for you.

Finished the game on its brand new Enhanced Edition, and I can tell you, it looks absolutely beautiful with Nvidia RTX. But enough with the graphics, Metro Exodus is a heart-pumping horror shooter with praiseworthy level design, gameplay mechanics, gunplay, audio design, acting, writing; but most especially an emotional but satisfying conclusion to the game -- if you got the good ending.
Superb, hope they continue the franchise and make it into the fallout we deserve

I remember the days when I played the first edition of Metro 2033. What a terrible (in positive sense!) PC gaming experience it was, with fully rebindable keys, marred only by the stupidest of the stupid atrocious console vomit save system, the checkpoint.You cured somewhat this plague, by implementing a half-baked saving system with F5/F9 which function only OUTSIDE OF COMBAT.Why on Earth I cannot save *my game*, whenever and wherever I want?Why on Earth I cannot leave the goddamned stupid radio/map when holding A (and have to tap E, in the same time, a mysterious combination found on the internet, which doesn't work all the time, only 1 in 4 tries), IF I rebinded my keys to a way better scheme TFGH than the outdated WASD?You press T to run you idiots, then tap X to sprint, then with your thumb you press Space if you want to jump or AltGr to slide, waaaayyyyy easier than using your pinky on Shift then CTRL or worse, pinky on Shift, left index on C and middle finger on W... R reload, Y use, U trowables, J melee, 4, 5, 6 weapons, 7 lighter, D gas mask, S filters, etc. how simple and fancy that is...You implemented 6(!) keys for run/walk/sprint (ing) toggle and hold despite the fact that nowadays we need only to tap it NOT hold it like it was during my grandmother gaming times and YET when I have to change the throwables, I have to also support the vomit inducing antiquated piece of trashware stinking scent, by pressing U (rebinded scheme) then to move the mouse up/down/left/right (!!!) like I am scratching the left ear with the right toe like a baboon.Why on Earth I cannot set the weapons in the platinum iridium ruthenium rhodium osmium way, THE PC WAY, 1 knife, 2 pistol, 3 assault rifle, 4 shotgun, 5 throwables, 6 heavy weapons and so forth (up to = !) as it used to be (as far as I remember) in you first Metro game?You use to be PC gamers guy, what a terrible machine the PC is and you are switching your settings to the bronze-age dumpster boxes which are only good for growing mushrooms on a bed of enriched soil with dessicated cow dung.4 thumbs downs for this despicable console port scheme, for not being able to FULLY rebind the keys.1 thumb down for the idiotic screen tearing, even if I set the VSync to fast and Triple-Buffering on in NVidia panel. "Switch VSync on, duh", yeah, no kidding.Another thumb down for the jerky demanding game resources. I wouldn't say "this game looks bad", quite the contrary, but guys, cmon, I wonder what RTX and Ray Tracing you implement on Ancient Egyptian slaves wooden coffins.I would have rated this game a solid 9 if you hadn't implemented the sickness-inducing console scheme and you had solved the awful screen tearing even on Ultra settings.Get back to your senses guys and don't f. up something that is working. If it ain't broke, don't fix it.PC is freedom.

Some animations and details are impressive, graphics are good, shooting feels great. Game is borring tho, I can't explain it, but it's just not fun to play. P.S. After all that **** me in the ass swith to Epic store few days before release I don't even wanna.

This game very slow and boring. I absolutely hate the character of anna, she adds nothing except a way to make the game about a female instead of artyom. You could remove her from the game and the score will rise by 4 points. But overall its just slow and not good enough for 2020.

Редкий случай, когда мне хочется дать все 10 баллов игре. Конечно, не в последнюю очередь потому, что я из России и я обожаю железные дороги. В общем то и неудивительно, ААА игр, где события разворачиваются на пост-советском пространстве за последние годы вышло...ну вот метро, в общем то и все. Безусловно для СНГ игрока это уникальный опыт: все такое родное, знакомое, атмосфера - одна из сильнейших сторон этой игры. В нее вживаешься, ей веришь, ее хочется исследовать. Не в последнюю очередь благодаря замечательному лору и шикарной постановке.Многие жалуются, что игра стала хуже по сравнению с прошлыми частями, что не нужен был этот опенворлд. Честно говоря, не согласен совсем. Уход от корридорных шутеров и эксперимент с опен-ворлдом явно себя оправдал. Metro стала похожа на нечто вроде Far Cry в пост-апокалипсисе. Локации действительно не особенно богаты на живность. Но, для первой попытки - замечательно. Я с удовольствием обследовал все интересные точки на всех локациях, исследовал каждый домик, выполнил каждый квест. Решение вывести "Метро" из подземки, на мой взгляд, себя оправдало. Локации просто невероятные, от пустыни до тайги, от лесов до руин новосибирского метро. Безумно порадовала возможность познакомиться с вселенной "метро" за рамками Москвы. Очень было интересно увидеть Новосибирскую подземку. Очень хочется верить, что когда-нибудь и Петербург увидим. Сюжет уступает прошлым частям, но в любом случае держал в интриге до самого конца. Очень порадовала графика и неплохая оптимизация, 60 фпс даже на средненькой машине. Наконец, великолепный саундтрек. Идеально передает нужную в разных ситуациях атмосферу.Ну и минусы тоже есть, хотя они совсем незначительны для меня. Во-первых, звуки. Они в игре странные, иногда тишина там, где должен быть шум, иногда шум неравномерный и т.д. С озвучкой такие же проблемы, в т.ч. с ее громкостью. Некоторые актеры отыграли откровенно не очень, где-то рот говорит, а звуки не идут и т.д. Помимо прочего, реально не хватало нормального русского мата. Это же апокалипсис, выжили явно не интеллигенция. Управление явно с консолей, оно неудобное. Кто, например, придумал поставить на одну кнопку выбор снаряжения и его использование?! Столько раз из-за этого ошибки совершал. Ну и извечная проблема игры - ГГ аутист, не умеющий разговаривать. В общем целом, шикарная игра. Невероятно погружающая и атмосферная. В Новосибирской миссии настолько качественно все поставлено и сделано, что у меня в какой то момент даже в реальности заболела голова, словно сам под радиацию попал. Похожее у меня было только в одной игре -  в Walking Dead.Прошел весь Exodus на одном дыхании, это мой новый личный фаворит, за новостями о сиквеле которого я теперь слежу с искренним интересом и нетерпением.

Not a revolution but an unexpected hit for me this year.  Game really feels like a journey.  It's been a while since a game felt like that for me.  At this point you can completely disregard any negative reviews for performance as it's running great now and really is a beautiful game.  If you haven't played the Metro series, I recommend starting at the beginning and playing all the way through.  Each game is great in it's own right and with the remasters, they hold up graphically.

I find it stupid that people trash this game because of the Epic Game Store, as if Steam was a close friend of yours and you don't want any competition for Gabe Newell.The game is nice enough, has good graphics, detailed locations and some nice moments. Unfortunately, there are several elements that keep it from greatness. Graphics are good but not great, by far. The smallest mutant is a much greater threat than five or six human enemies armed to the teeth, and considering the excessive respawn, this means a whole lot of wasted ammo. Having characters speak with a bad English accent does not work for me. Dialogues are a pain, especially considering the frequent, long pauses between sentences, they prevent me from relating to the characters. A terribly annoying bear boss. Sections where you need a mask, with filters that burn up resources faster than a Gatling on full auto.TL;DR: Enjoyable but also flawed. Would be a 7, giving 8 to counterbalance Epic haters somewhat.
Digno sucesor, aunque no a la altura de los anteriores, imprescindible si eres fan de la saga, si no, si tienes game pass para pc, deberías jugarlo.

I'm going to start by warning that you should avoid the PC version entirely. Ominous way to start a review, I know. However, there are a few game-breaking crashes that WILL make your experience absolute hell if you ever counter them, so I strongly advise NOT playing the PC version if possible. Or at least, avoid the Xbox Game Pass version and run the game with DirectX 11 and not 12. Metro Exodus was definitely an improvement over Last Light. The story seems more cohesive and knows the story it's trying to tell. I liked Exodus' improvement in graphics, greater realism, proper resource management, and better balanced difficulty. There are some oddities like super fast sprinting and over-sensitivity to fire, and some inconveniences like slow movement especially with the AI and long travel distances. But they're not a big deal once you learn to work around them. Exodus consists of several maps which are structured like arcs, each with their own story and unique features. The game really picks up and becomes incredibly fun to play once you reach the desert map, which is about halfway into the game. There are some plot holes like how Artyom is still alive for this sequel and where his daughter vanished off to. Exodus links onto the secret good ending of Last Light, which is sadly extremely difficult to acquire. If you're bothered by the disjointed connection, watch a video of the good ending to Last Light. You'll get the answer for the first plot hole but not the second--his daughter remains non-existent in Exodus. Overall, not factoring the crashes, the game deserves an 8. It does recycle gameplay from its prequels and doesn't really try to introduce anything new, but the journey itself is an enjoyable one. GAME-BREAKING CRASHESI experienced two severe crashes. One was during a part of the game where I had to transport a railcar back to base and had to change the direction of the tracks on the way there. If you crash trying to get back on the railcar, load up an earlier save and park the railcar earlier on the tracks (not near the track switch) before getting off the railcar to change the track direction. For my second crash, it is much later in the game when Artyom has to escape from some kidnappers. My entire PC would turn black and freeze and would require a hard reset. This seems to be a serious issue others have experienced as well. The only way I could get around this part of the game was to change the game to DirextX 11 and disable Hairworks. Since I'm playing the Xbox Game Pass version, I could only do this by forcefully crashing the game via the Task Manager and activating Safe Mode.

игра могла быть хорошей,но портят все вечные баги:то дамир замрет и не двигаеться,а он по сюжету должен помочь,то гуль подвисает.И куча не влияющие на сюжет но раздрожающих Типо бесмертных враго, трупов дергующиеся и находящиеся под текстурамии это только то с чем сам столкнулся На ps4.даже не представляю что там на компе наворотили...Да и мир пустоват.

Metro Exodus is not a lot of fun. I'm glad it was so cheap during the recent sale. It's one of those "hard" shooters where you die in a couple shots, which would be more fun if this didn't mean the correct choice was always remaining in stealth. Once an enemy camp is alerted of your presence, they instantly all immediately know exactly where you are, even in pitch blackness when you can't even see them in return. Enemies could be having a loud party and you make one tiny bunny hop outside behind a brick wall and WOOP WOOP the alarm bells start ringing and the entire world opens fire on your exact location. It's stupid. This is 2019, and I think we expect a bit better. It was tolerable in the other two because they had a great atmosphere, and a great story, and even if the combat was still just as asymmetrical and broken-stealth heavy, at least you being in a subway tunnel meant you had a general idea of which direction to return fire. I even completed them on ranger difficulty because I enjoyed the games so much. But this METRO is much more open world, with tall buildings and wreckage and multiple flanking positions and packs after packs of roaming monsters that are just there to eat up your ammo and make traversing to your next objective take longer. It wasn't fun in STALKER in 2007 and it still isn't fun today. The trope of the "silent protagonist" has always seemed questionable to me, yeah I get that Valve does that a lot, but you really need to have interesting supporting characters to pull that off. In a *dialog heavy* game where other boring characters are repeatedly brainstorming ideas and *looking for your input* by asking direct questions, it becomes totally ridiculous. "Atryom, go back to base and tell my dad..." "Artyom, what do you think our next move should be". Over and over and over and over. Dull dialog that goes on forever but never says anything much. A more patient person, or someone new to shooters might have fun if you turn the difficulty down to 0 and just play it as a run and gun and skip all the dull story. I have better things to do with my time. 3/10

Absolutely fantastic according to me. I love it. I felt so much as part of the game and story was so strong that I was crying at the end.+graphics and audio+characters+story+game length+variety of surroundings and enemies+weapon upgrade system+unlike in many other games, your fiends can really help you with dealing with enemies+stealth elements-very weak graphical options-not very well optimised-speechless main character In conclusion, amazing job from game developers. I am really glad and thankful for such a strong quality game.
Bad story telling, ugly graphics on caracters and cluncky gameplay. Only positive thing I can say about this mediocre game is that it has good lighting.
I love this game but face animation was really bad    .

After 100% completion of the main game, and 100 hours spent in it, I can objectively write an opinion. The game is good for its plot and atmosphere. Shooting and graphics are also onlevel ... But lately, with the release of both DLCs, the game became broken ... sometimes even critically. Passing the game on the Ranger-Hardcore difficulty, I swore very much ... On the broken timings of the Forest Master, because of which, if he knocks you over, he won’t get up.To the broken reaction of the NPC, to the broken lanterns who don’t seem to shine, but they find you in the dark ... After all this, I went through the game for the perfect ending and for the 5th time I saw all this, and I do not regret that I spent so much time and nerves on this game ... Now I’m going to “Two Colonels” - I have already received the most problematic achievements there, so there shouldn’t be any problems (Yeah, well) In general, I advise the game, but only for atmospheric passage on difficulty not higher than average!

Terrific continuation of the adventures of Artem and the people of Metro 2033. If you've played the previous parts, you can safely buy it. All fans of the post-apocalypse also recommend it. Of the minuses mute gg. A pluses above the roof, awesome picture, atmospheric ruined cities. No store and micro payments. Super wow.

Things I didn't like:· Detection system, sometimes you get spotted too easily· Sometimes the melee attack option doesn't pop up· Because of the previous two issues, at some point of the story it didn't make sense to keep trying to get the best ending.· Physics. Many times when you jump or jump while bumping into something, you either jump higher than normal or it feels like you're jumping on the moon.· Visual bugs throughout the whole story.· Even though I listened to most of the dialogs and enjoyed exploring I finished the main story in less than 20 hours, with an ending that left me waiting for a bit more. I really enjoyed:· The new crafting system.· Weapon customization.· Ambient and immersion in each zone is better than ever.· The story is different, more fun and dynamic because you spend most of the time outside.

Игра шикарна, без преувеличения, своих денег, как на пк так и на других платформах. Из плюсов могу выделить : шикарную атмосферу, отличный саундтрек, довольно непростой и интересный геймплей, красивейшую картинку запоминающихся душевных персонажей, которых ты воспринимаешь, как живых людей и сопереживаешь им, ну и конечно "легендарный" открытый мир на локации "Волга", где можно просто пройти туда куда тебя явно не звали. Из минусов я заметил только небольшие сюжетные недочеты и глупости о которых ты забываешь спустя минуту, так как они не значительны. Это первая игра которую я до конца прошел за долгие месяцы, это первая игра от которой я получил настоящее удовольствие. Всем рекомендую.

Графика - эталонная для индустрии, и в плане дизайна, и в плане технологий - текстур, шейдеров, освещения, тумана и т.д. Сюжет - комиксовый, как и в предыдущих частях, реализмом и не пахнет, но довольно интересный. Концовка эмоционально очень сильная (я на хорошую прошел). Минусы - опять в основном стелсом проходишь, ну и озвучка Мельника - я все понимаю, но там актер озвучки пафоса перебрал аж слушать тяжело. Ну и сам игровой процесс - все тебя одергивают, внимание обращают, ты ходишь как Киркоров на рынке - все сразу смотрят, окликают, прям не один из членов отряда, а суперзвезда какая-то. А в целов - отличная игра получилась. Багов только очень много, это плохо. Но в плане визуала - просто эталон, более красивых игр не видел. В целом - конечно же всем советую, один раз пройти обязательно надо.

This is why one should not preorder. I love the Metro series, especially Last Light. This on the other hand is not an enjoyable experience. I looked so much forward to this game and was sure it was going to be a good time, it's not. My rating has absolutely nothing to do with epicstore, purely on what the game offers, which is little, though if it was worked on for 1-2 years more I think it could easily jump 2 stars.

Постараюсь кратко и по делу:прошёл игру взахлеб за 3 дня, ну не мог оторваться, настолько она захватывающая.Да, в ней присутствует большое количество багов, да, местами игра повторяет саму себя, но черт возьми, насколько она красивая! И я не про графику, а именно про работу геймдизайнеров. Вся эта атмосфера, локации, колоссальное внимание к деталям и мелочам. Это просто потрясающе.Персонажи (пускай и с чопорной анимацией) настолько живые, что я по пол часа не мог уйти с поездка, задерживался на посиделки и разговоры с ними.Игра проходится на одном дыхании. Так и норовит узнать, что же там дальше...10 из 10, не иначе. Купил и прошел на пк.

Not great, not terrible. Score : 3.6 / 5.0 + Graphics and art design.+ Solid Sound and ok Music.+ Good Atmosphere+ Quite long single player campaign.+ Interesting Weapons and mods. - Bad dialogue (There are many Cliché, cringe moments)- Bad voice acting,- Mediocre story.- Too many Scripted events.- Too many action events when you press "E" 100 times.- Last map was quite terrible compared to the others.- The A.I is not that great. It gets quite hilarious when you get sniped by a shotgun at 200meters.
Господи это одна из лучших игр в которые я играл в своей жизни.
От концовки я охерел, её геймплей, атмосфера, цена,сюжет, ВСЁ ОФИГЕННО 10/10!!! СТИМБОИ, СОСААААТТТТ!!!!

An excellent game, as expected from the authors of the previous parts, which I really liked at theirs time. Good and beautiful graphics, normal music and sound, although emotionally much weaker than in the previous parts. An interesting story about a difficult path in the post-apocalypse. Interesting companions(not a no-name doll), diverse, albeit deserted landscapes. Different stories of those who are considered the villains of the game(not a simple division into black and white). Very simple but adequate craft and weapon customization. Optional, but very interesting stories that you can listen to, just being next to certain characters.I would give the highest rating, but unfortunately the game is not devoid of a number of faults that are difficult to close your eyes to for the sake of all its advantages.1) The protagonist is an emotionless mute doll. It's just idiocy and some kind of archaism. Everyone around is talking to him, giving orders, shouting, asking questions... and you are stupidly silent like a fish killed on ice. You feel like a crippled idiot. This is a huge disadvantage in fact, for a modern first-person game about such a serious plot.2) In contrast to the first - all other characters in the game overly gesticulate during conversations. Some of them are expressed during talking as some kind of pretentious book characters, and the other part - as prisoners who have just been released from prison. However, this is not so critical for the entourage, like this fierce gesticulation... it's horrific.3) Game scripts are too crooked. As the most understandable example: in one place I fought with a bear almost without receiving damage at all, at a certain moment the character's state jumped to critical(red frame on screen) when the next script started. The game, ####, decided that I had too much health at this moment.4) Long animation of doors, boats, cars, etc. which cannot be interrupted. You are slowly entering the car, examining the key... and at the same moment a crowd of zombies is running at you... great.5) From time to time it is impossible to hit the enemy with machine gun. From time to time, bullets can fly as they please. I saw no problems with the rest of the weapon though.6) Bouncing bodies. This is both funny and stupid at the same time: the game has zombies who like to sleep, the game also says that the damage to a relaxed enemy is much higher... as a result, when you throw a knife, for example, at a sleeping zombie, their dead body jumps a meter in height, damn it.7) Stealth works only on half: firing with a silencer next to someone will be heard and this is normal, but the turmoil of killing an enemy with a knife will not be particularly heard in a couple of meters.Even if only partial shade - you can't be seen, come to the back of your enemy to breathe in his ear. Even when it's dawn and logically enough light... But if you just move a little in the illuminated space, you will be seen from the other end of the map.(@) I really hate it when people say something like that: "Sorry, I didn't tell you about this because I didn't want to bother you" - this is not a claim to a game, but just a cry from the heart about a disgusting character's trait in people.(@) The open world did not become truly open, but it pleasantly diversified one solid sausage of the dark underground. So here 1:1....In the end, this is an excellent story, spoiled by a slightly crooked game-play and some bad mechanics.
I like this game - no automatic compass, alternative pathes, minimal / no HUD, no enemy highlighting. Replayable (1. no alarm / 2. no kills). Nice post-apo world. Wish Fallout 5 looks like this...

Great FPS game with the wasteland background,best snow scenes I ever seeing,excellent narrative in Russia, only the combat system wasn't good enough,Character movement look too stiff and AI shows me how foolish they are(Ver 1.0.0.0). 8.7 Great

This game has much less horror elements than the previous series as they added more sunny vibe to the game which I really do not like. It is still a good game but they failed to differentiate on what is scary and what is annoying  which I see a lot in the enemies and mutants. Another minus one point for this game is the broken save file that I experience which was very frustrating. I kinda have a love hate relationship with this game but one thing for sure is that this game in terms of enemy mechanics is slightly worse than the previous series.

Gas masks on.Metro again radiates with quality special story driven fps experience.But there was still some serious disappointment since this is third.Felt fresh all until slightly before the end.Then it was like Archives level i think from first one which would be fine if there was something more behind it.Hated it towards the end and endings.No final boss or something,really.Wish there was interaction with or something about Dark Ones.Fully action cinematic packed game and then they skimp with the ending,almost like they put a static pic with some lame narration.Booo that sucks!Thought Humanimals would just annoy me but they were actually the funniest mutants.Mutated Bear kinda sucked because he was predictable.At least Olga thought it was AWESOME hah.Game has atmosphere and maturity as always.Love Metro games.

Im very new to the Metro series so i did'int really know what to expect. My brother bought it for his birthday and since me and my bro are playing it like crazy, this game is so immersive and so beautiful. And if there are people that want a challenging  game then i recommend Metro exodus it's fun , hard and like i said it's immersive and the story line is excellent the only thing that may get you crazy is the loading screen that is long but totally worth the wait 10/10

Review: Metro exodus is Peak metro ( like it or not and there seems to be a lot of or nots on metacritic) but i'm here to tell you dont worry this game is good and really fun , its a gritty "realistic" shooter that you have to take your time with is it plagued with bugs and crashes also yes , its easy to look past though when you realize how much the devs at 4 A had to go through just to get their first game out and subsequently this one Story: 1 year after the events of metro last light. artyom is determined to find someplace besides the metro tunnels alive out there when him and his wife anna ( who he marries during the time skip ) find a conspiracy to keep the people of the metro ignorant to the happenings of the outside world , artyom his wife and some members of the order are then chased out by the conspirators where they search for either a place to settle or another war to fight. artyom and anna's relationship is on full display in this game where in last light it was awkward and forced in exodus it really feels like they are in love even if artyom cant speak ( or refuses to) making things worst it feels like artyom is a man trapped in his own medium being a silent protagonist using only his hands and animations to emote , this is no different than the first 2 games but a silent protagonist is an out dated practice in this industry and id like to have him speak. the characters are far more likeable in this game , and how much time you spend with them will affect how much you like them , i think the way characters should feel is that they are all living their own lives and that's how it feels in metro exodus  even if the voice acting and animations aren't perfect they all still feel like people with a place in the world and thats niceStory: 8/10 Worldbuilding: i was a little disappointed with the world building in exodus , this is a game of small open worlds where people have their own way of life, the metro is the survivors of the old world , the icy lakes ruled by bandits and a cult , the desert dunes rampaged by violent tyrants and slavers and the forest of tribal elementary school students led by a teacher who believed he failed them each little open world has its own secrets , lore , and characters , my problem with this is that it feels episodic with the train folks stories being somewhat in the background , i don't think this kind of story telling works for metro and it makes the whole world feel a little choppy even if each world individually feels good , it would be fine in a standalone game or a different series all together but it just feels out of place in metroWorld building7/10 Graphics: MUCH improved , feels like a new engine all together this game looks great even on lower settings (until you get to certain textures) again its not perfect but looks far better than the previous games , its just glitchy , this game is mired with bugs graphical and otherwise , iv crashed a few times and had to use save scumming to get through certain areas without crashes , this games ambition is outside the reach of its tech.Graphics: 7.3/10 Gameplay: this game is a joy to play , its slow and methodical you really have to pick your next move carefully on harder difficulties  using stealth and the element of surprise rather than just going in guns a blazing. your weapons are your tools  and need to be upkept or else they will jam in the middle of a fire fight a mechanic that only far cry 2 has even dared to try ( i like it though makes fire arms feel like well firearms) and each gun in this game behaves differently even the similar ones , the AK47 is fast firing and fairly accurate but compared to the bulldog witch fires slower but is far more accurate even if they are both automatic assault rifles they are different, enemies react to what you do , try to counter everything is situational and the enemies will react , sometimes its not about being a step ahead but being 4-5 steps ahead or being so far ahead they don't even see you , this game gives you a lot of freedom to approach situations in how ever you see fit, the problem is it is very buggy.Gameplay:9/10 Sound design: the voice acting as iv mentioned is decent , sometimes it is awkward and i think mo cap would have helped immensely here ( yeah it's expensive i know why they didn't do it) all the animations feel hand animated rather than an actor's performance witch i really think could have helped the acting but i digress minor gripe all things considered. the sound effects are wonderful though , explosions , and gun shows ring out in echos and sound crisp and satisfying ESPECIALLY the bulldog assault rifle even when a gun is silenced it still sounds crisp and satisfying.Sound design: 8.2/10 8+7+7.3+7.2+9+8.2= 39.539.55= 7.9
Güzel grafikler, fena olmayan bir hikaye, iyi atmosfer. Ancak oyun kolu ile oynarken oluşan kontrol sorunları ciddi derecede canımı sıktı ve klavye mouse ikilisi ile oynamak zorunda kaldım.

Uno de esos juegos que ya no se hacen y que encima arriesga a dar un paso mas que sus antecesores al intentar hacer partes no lineales, quizás no deberían haber tenido prisas por sacarlo, se le nota la falta de tiempo en bastantes detalles. Gráficamente un titulo sobresaliente del los que ya no se ven en medio de tantos monigotes de colores, flojea un poco en las partes narrativa y jugable, pero solo por verlo merece la pena. A mi parecer un muy buen juego que podía ser mejor si dejasen de meterle prisas a la gente que trabaja en esto para poder hacer dinero rápido. Lo valoro desde el punto de vista de alguien que pago 17€ por la goty

More metro...but no. This game continues the way the other metro, but, this time the action happens in an open place, for this reason, the game ha lost the terror climax in dark tunnels of Moscow's metro. Now we can craft weapons and bullets and history is the best of the three games. Further Artion continues without speaking. If you liked the other Metro games, you will enjoy this.

Short review as usual. Good:* Game design, levels, locations.* Atmosphere - authentic, USSR or Russian (call anyway you wish). Small details and so on.* Variety of guns.* Game pace. Can finish without many kills. Bad:* Characters didn't seem "real". They were like crown during shooting a movie. Motivation, actions are also unclear in many situations.* Main character is a fish (never speaks).* The game is scripted too much.* Sometimes (as in the first Metro) you don't understand why you should go there and what the hell is happening (losing the line of the plot).* Plot itself is LOL. Unfortunately needed more deaths of key characters, sacrifices, better motivation. That would have really helped.

Одна из лучших игр в которые я играл, с учётом того что играю уже больше 5 лет. Хочется отметить отличную графику, прекрасный геймплей (особенно доставили рюкзак и крафт), а также интересный сюжет и конечно прекрасный саундтрек и озвучку.Ну и недостатков она не лишена конечно, но куда же без этого, заранее извиняюсь, но и Дикая охота их не лишена если уж на то пошло, однако обе эти игры прекрасны. Я только что закончил проходить Metro: Exodus и признаюсь в конце мне стало откровенно страшно перед обезьянами (я в курсе, что их называют библиотекарями, читал книгу, но даже если это их новосибирская версия то я всё равно буду называть их "обезьяны"), мне и первой игре было очень сложно проходить уровень в Великой библиотеке, а потом... А потом я чуть не заплакал, настолько грустна здесь плохая концовка, а прошёл именно на неё, т. к. проходил как попало по типу:"Ой, меня спалили, что же мне делать?Хм... А может перезапустить уровень? Не, лень. Пускай так будет"Теперь хочу сказать одно: ЛЮДИ ВЫ СОВСЕМ С УМА СОШЛИ ЧТО-ЛИ?!? Неужели такую хорошую игру можно угробить лишь из-за того, что её издатели решили, что выгодней будет уйти из Steam с его 36% комиссией (заранее извиняюсь если инфа неправильная, но по сути так всё и есть) и перейти в Epic Store с комиссией 12%? Я просто не понимаю неужели некоторые настолько ленивы что не могут залезть интернет и создать аккаунт? Цена та же самая, что вам не нравится?P.S. Я прекрасно понимаю что тавтологии в этом тексте полно, прошу простить, сейчас меня просто переполняют эмоции, а в крови шкалит адреналин и потому не могу нормально думать.

Exceptional game, has loads of everything. Gameplay is fun, choose your style but lends itself a bit more to slight stealth, but not a must. You can go all guns blazing if you want.Looks gorgeous! The graphics really adds so much to the game, one moment you'll be walking in a sunlit, hot area and the next gusts of wind sweeps in, bringing dust and a somber feeling with it. Lighting throughout the game makes me want to get a RTX card, my GTX 1060 did a great job though.The story, is also great, its not going to win a Oscar, but its not soap opera crap, nice to have and follow, perhaps a little silly with some of the conversations.Character models are excellent! Seeing Anna again made me fall in love!Overall, besides the DRM move from STEAM to EPIC store crap, it's a great game, don't miss this game because of the DRM thing.The only little downside, is the weapons that deteriorate, but you can keep them clean, plus, you have never stressed until a big enemy charges you and your weapons jams, forcing you to reload. It never really made me want to stop playing, just remember to keep your guns clean.

Let's not hide the intrigue and not repeat in large numbers. The game is gorgeous, its most juice is the atmosphere. The post-Apocalypse in the realities of Russia is elegantly implemented: colorful characters (appearance, speech, behavior), atmospheric locations in different areas of the "vast", with different local characteristics. The crew of our train worked well, but they need time to reveal (at the beginning of their appearance was stunned, compared to the faceless Spartans and Ullman).BUT the whole game I did not let go of a certain feeling, as if something is missing. And so the end of the game and the city of Novosibirsk gave me what I wanted!The atmosphere of despair and severe lack of time, constant failures of weapons, dark tunnels, pressing their vaults, hallucinations and "mysticism", as well as terrible mutants (and I'm not talking about kikimor and ghouls, but really creatures that cause FEAR, it seems the feeling was in the first part). That spirit at the end really got to my bones, that's what I wanted most. Incredible experience!
Очень класная игра. Я плакал в Финале...Очень сильно привязался к окружению главного героя. У каждогрперсонажа естьсвой характер, харизма, некая особенность. Непонравились только лицевые анимацыи
Отличная игра,особенно для стран СНГ!3 раза прошёл и каждый раз новые эмоции.Всем советую и надеюсь разработчики сделают продолжение великолепной серии
Artyom walks and runs/sprints so slowly it's annoying. And no exit to desktop button in main menu.

Esto ya no es un Metro, la historia es pasable. Lo peor son los fallos técnicos, si no tienes un SSD, los tiempos de cargo se miden en minutos, la sensación de disparar es horrible, me recuerda al metro 2033 original, las modificaciones de las armas no parecen que hagan nada, la sensación de movimientos de Artyon se nota tosca y pesada. En conclusión, si no lo comparar con cualquier otro metro es un juego meriocre, y si lo comparas con metro es una basura

In a age of cheap content, knock offs and microtransactions plague, Metro Exodus manages to keep a worthy sequel to it's previous Metro titles. Whether it's a great stealth combat or amazingly crafted cutscenes, the original stories... Metro really does feel like a post apocalyptic game, unlike it's modern competitors.Small thing to improve the game: Set the dub to Russian and subtitles to English for best experience, as the English dub feels like a cheap anime dub.
Fantastic game, a perfect end to the story. Played it on a 1440p and it looks amazing!Makes me wanna read Dmitry Glukhovsky's books.

Being a massive fan of both the previous games I had a high hopes for Exodus. Besides the standard average optimisation of a Metro game, and the few bugs I’ve encountered, there are still a lot of other otherwise fairly minor issues with the game, that when added together sadly make this a pretty disappointing edition to an otherwise solid series. The biggest problem is one that really makes or breaks an FPS game: weapons. Not only do they feel ridiculously clumsy to use, they also

- AI is pathetic. I have gone from being half a metre away from a turkey and not detecting myself or from being far away and super hidden and being detected by all the enemies in the area. The most pathetic thing is surrender. I've gone from killing 3 men, staying 4 alive and having me surrounded and surrendering all 4 at once. Then, in addition, to go out to another zone and see 2 enemies more arms in high - Artyom's movement is slow, clumsy and feels of the past generation. I don't think it's normal that in a 2019 game you get caught in a pixel that protrudes from a branch of a tree, or that you get close to a fence or wall, you jump and in the middle of the jump you put the animation of a step off. Or worse, don't hook the movement to the first one and you have to jump 2 or 3 times to be caught by the climb. In that sense it is very outdated. I'd also like to know which genius came up with the same button to duck as to collect ammunition from weapons. It's great to be covered, want to take bullets from a corpse next to you, don't catch the action and stand up, making A-dies if you're in a B-fire- you get caught. - The story doesn't hold up, nor does it have a head or a foot, especially because of the way certain situations are presented to you. It is not normal that in the part of the sect, you enter the church as if it were a cinema with everyone watching and 30 seconds later you are hostile to everyone for no apparent reason, when you have been shot 3 seconds before helpless from a boat. Miller doesn't make sense, it goes from wanting you to die to helping you 3 times in each encounter with him. The inhibitors are ridiculous. - The behavior of the allies is so cutrísimo, again belongs to the last generation. Those infinite conversations are a pain in the ass, you walk away from one who is giving you the badge and you look from afar and keep talking to you. Also, as I say the conversations are a pain in the ass and very chaotic, there can be 2 or 3 conversations at the same time, making you not know anything. - The sound is MALISIMO. The weapons that sound like toys are joined by a 3D sound, no matter how much atmosphere I say it has, non-existent. The audio mix is painful, and the sound controller can't fix it. It can't be that being next to an npc, you don't hear him just because the ambient sound is heard more. It's been years since I had to put the subtitles to find out something. - Of graphics I don't see it SO pointer. I play it on an Xbox One X with a NU8005 55", calibrated meniculously and the game looks BAD. The HDR is implemented like the ass. The gamma slider is rotary. The textures are some really good and some really bad. The facial modeling is very bad, the faces are not bad, but they are very inexpressive and in the secondary characters the faces are very bad. Also the lighting on the faces is very dull, and in a game where there are so many cinematic characters in the foreground is lost a lot of quality. I won't compare it to RDR2, the faces of Crysis 3 or Mass Effect 3 are much better. The rest, which is the lighting, particles, polygonal charge, etc because the same thing, there are very good moments and other very bad ones. - It has TOO many cinematic scenes, and the worst thing is that they are almost all scenes without any interest and quite badly performed and repetitive. Situations that you're controlling your game and suddenly something happens and you stay as "but let me control the **** everything to end up with Artyom being saved to the limit by an npc that grabs his arm, either underwater, when hitting a jump or fall somewhere. - I don't think the atmosphere is half as good as 2033 and Last Light. In short, a game very outdated in the playable that has been given an injection of graphics and a fist of open world and crafting and track. I hope it gets better but I think it's the first big disappointment of the year.

I really wanted to like this game ,but unfortunately it doesnt grab me...The graphics are amazing there are a few bugs but thats okay.The part i dont like is that it has lost its metro vibe.It doesnt feel like a Metro game.The first hour is really cool and then it plummets.Instead of roaming through tunnels you are out in the open.No gas mask,no mutants.

Шедевр! Прожив у грі ще одне життя! Розробникам особливе спасибі за українську локалізацію (помилки тільки в субтитрах виправте :) Графіка, музика, сюжет, живі персонажі - для мене це гра року. Грав на ультра, жодних багів, вильотів чи чогось подібного. Хоча бачу багато хто писав про це. Так не купуйте гру зразу після виходу, виждіть пару місяців поки вийде декілька патчів, і грайте з задоволенням, як я)).Дивують коментатори, які ставлять 0 за Epic Store, яке відношення гра має до того, де вона продається?? Щодо тих, кому не подобається, що Артем мовчить, так то якраз помагає зануритися в гру, вжитися в роль. Невже це не зрозуміло?

The game is great! Great transfer of the local atmosphere! the most atmospheric game of its kind. a great story, worthy of screening. Excellent graphics the level of 2018! Dialogues are written well, and make you laugh and cry, so to speak. In the final, he let out a Spartan tear for the Miller.
O melhor fps da geração, além de uma trilha sonora e enredo incrível, boa jogabilidade e sistema de progreção
It's just another post-apocalyptic FPS. I still enjoyed playing it from start to finish but that's all.

Я считаю что это лучшая игра как в серии, так и во всем СНГ. Выражаю огромную благодарность 4a games  за эту замечательную игру и дополнение "Два полковника", которое не уступает основному шедевру. Системные требования сильно завышены. Для средних настроек графики мне хватает geforce gtx 1050ti, intel core i5 6600k и 8 гб оперативной памяти. English version: I believe that this is the best game in the series and throughout the CIS. I express my deep gratitude to 4a games for this wonderful game and the addition “Two Colonels,” which is not inferior to the main masterpiece. System requirements are overpriced. For medium graphics settings, I have enough geforce gtx 1050ti, intel core i5 6600k and 8 GB of RAM.
Great graphics.  But this game looked weaker than the previous ones. In my opinion there was less pleasant atmosphere and interesting gameplay.  It's my opinion.

Other than a few bugs here and there and obvious performance issues, this has honestly been the most intense and most moving single player game series i have ever played, Exodus had me hooked from the get go i am so sad it takes so long between games for a new one to realise and i do hope this is not the last, I absolutely loved this game and felt so drawn and connected the characters the whole campaign hit me where it hurts at the end my only hope was that there was more.

Vamos a ver por donde empezar, este juego no es un juego de la saga metro ya que ves el metro 15 jodidos minutos en total, todo el juego es un mundo semiabierto y muy vacio repetitivo hasta el hastio menos malque que lo jugue con el.game pass y no pague 60 euros por un shooter generico y penoso.

Ну что сказать... Перепройдя ее спустя год, но уже с DLC, можно сказать, что игра заслуживает вашего времени и внимания. При первом прохождении положительных впечатлений было гораздо больше, но на то оно и первое. В целом игру рекомендую, есть конечно много косяков, но и хорошего тоже немало. Отдельно хотел бы обратить внимание на парочку минусов и плюсов. Начну с минусов. 1. Научите же Артема уже говорить - сидеть и терпеть "нужные" и одновременно нудные для сюжета диалога просто невозможно. К примеру, герои DLC говорить умеют и игровой процесс это меняет в гораздо лучшую сторону.2. Боевка просто мрак, монстры, которые перед атакой "зависают" на секунду-две, просто выбешивающие враги со встроенным аимом, которые попадают по тебе из каждого угла, в то время как ты в них так попасть не можешь (а опыт шутеров у меня ого-го) и прочее. Касаемо плюсов. 1. Конечно же атмосфера. Атмосфера всей серии передана отлично, в том числе благодаря проработанным и интересным локациям - будь то тяжелая Волга, солнечный Каспий, напоминающая детство Тайга или ужасающий Новосибирск. Также хочу отметить Владивосток из DLC, играя в котором, поневоле очень часто вспоминаешь серию STALKER.2. Крафт оружия. Крафт реализован очень круто, куча вариаций модификаций, которые могут переводить оружие из одного класса в другой, не могут не доставлять удовольствия в процессе игры. В целом, поставив 9 после первого прохождения, и поставив 7 после второго, средняя оценка получается 8. У игры есть как сильные, так и слабые стороны, однако, если бы у меня спросили стоит ли в нее играть, я бы скорее всего ответил "Да".

Лучшая слезливая концовка которую я видел, не смотря на баги, которых уже скорее всего нет, игру должен опробовать каждый любитель шутеров и рпг.Геймплей: 4Сюжет: 5+Звук: 5Графика: 5+Итог: 10p.s. кто снизил оценку из-за стима не пройдя игру - пусть горит в аду...
Metro Exodus is one of the best story-driven FPS in recent years and the new enhanced edition with ray tracing looks absolutely amazing.

Ужас просто и неуважение к геймерам особенно тем что за 25+, играть в устаревшую геймплейную помойку в 2019 это регресс. В игре ничего нет, камера с оружием и все, пустые локации и дешевое подобие сюжета. Без комментариев 1 из 10.

Where do I even start? Should I even mention that this game looks stunning? Do I say how good the shooting feels?Honestly, I could talk about all of the ups in the Metro Exodus for a while but I'll just keep it short and say that this is pure, hardcore gaming. No hand holding or quest markers. The game respects you as a player and allows you to make your own decisions and carry them out the way you want and is not afraid to punish your for not planning things out or trying to rush it. For the first time in a very long time, I felt like I was actually playing, actually exploring and experiencing the world around me, taking in the sights, doing recon, preparing and planning in advance rather than just mindlessly following the pointer to the next objective. I felt like paying attention was rewarded and that it mattered! Sure, it's not perfect but it's amazing for what it is and I can't recommend this hybrid adventure/shooter/stealth game enough and if you're giving it a negative score because of Epic then shame on you for bashing a small game studio. The only thing that's keeping it from getting 10/10 from me are some bugs and performance inconsistency. P.S. It is available on Xbox Game Pass for 1€/month

I want to like this game, i really do.. but there is just alot wrong with the game here. I only got it recently and don`t care about the fact it's on epic. The game just has an even more budget feel than the previous metro games and looks like it is taking itself seriously while i just cannot anymore. The first 2 hours of play was just having the game crash and freeze constantly even though it's been out for months now. The AI is a joke, it is definitely artificial but by no stretch of the imagination intelligent. The thing that I just cannot stand is the idea of having a single save file!! If you get stuck somewhere and the game just decides to save over your only save file.. you're screwed. better restart your last 2 hours of gameplay have fun! in 20 hours of game time I've gotten stuck on scenery at least 30 times already, screw boats and tunnels, some abysmal game design choices a four year old could have told you was a bad idea.. I could go on and on about more problems i have but these outline my personal gripes with the game so far, don't even know if I want to finish the game if it will not allow me to explore at my own pace without punishing me for it. TL;DR: If you want a good metro experience, don't play this game. I quit before i finished because I felt i was fighting the game more than the enemies and am more annoyed than i am having fun.

Buen juego, lo he disfrutado desde el gamepass de Xbox. Buena trama, gráficos impresionantes y unas mecánicas entretenidas.La optimización deja bastante que desear, podría haber sido mucho mejor. Por lo demas muy recomendable para completar la historia de los dos anteriores ''Metro''.
Um dos melhores Metro.Graficos otimos.O game é pesado demais, não rodou no ultra na minha maquina.

It is a beautiful looking game with a good story. I liked the emptyish open world because I imagine that is what a nuclear wasteland looks like, and the view was always amazing. There was plenty of time to be spent underground and get jumped by nuclear mutant spiders or whatever. You won't like this if doom is your favorite game. You need to sneak around everyone to get the good ending. It is also a reasonably buggy game, with some crashes and things to laugh at, but I don't think it is enough to ruin it. There isn't much else to say. It's a pretty looking metro game thats half open world. 6/10

Wow man, what a game. I jumped into this not knowing what to expect, as I didn't read any of the books, or played any of the previous games and i must admit, that I'm blown away. Gameplay-wise it's something between Fallout and Farcry with more emphasis on survival, so if you liked any of those games (excluding F76 ofc. hehe) you should like this one. Visuals are stunning, great attention to detail, some really realistic looking scenes and textures, you can really feel that eastern European atmosphere. What really got me though, was the story and characters. I don't think I've been this interested in plot and attached to the crew since last Witcher and by the end it's a real trip. All that is not even considering any of the DLC's which I heaven't even touched yet. The whole thing took me about 35 hrs. on normal difficulty, so you also get your money's worth in that department. I really can't recommend this game enough! I'm only giving it a 9, instead of 10 due to a couple of minor visual bugs and maybe 2 hard crashes, so it's not perfect, but it's damn close imo.

Оценки игры разделились на очень высокие и очень низкие, что говорит только об одном, в одних игра не лаганула ни разу в других нехватило ресурсов пк, чтобы комфортно в нее играть. Так вот все это лишь негатив в сторону разработчиков за то, что "игра у меня не пошла ", так что " вот вам!!! "," вот вам получите!!! ". Игра на самом деле удивительгая только короткая

column1: Trillion of bugs but pretty graphics.

Review: Metro Exodus is full of contradictions. Firstly, it is definately different that two previous games of franchise. It brings Metro from claustrophobic locations to semi-open world. It is not that dirty, cruel, atmospheric as it was before, but still memorable. On the other hand, there are moments, when you wouldn't have any doubts - it is old Metro, still can be terrifing and atmospheric, but not through almost whole game. Enemies aren't as horrible as mutants. For example, the part of the game on the desert looks rather like Rage, not Metro, but last stages whilst looking for a medicines are terrifing and mind blowing as it was before. Created world is beautiful and dangerous. Maybe tunels and some interiors looks more like in Last Light, but views are amazing, truly outstanding. Animations and character models also aren't that remarkable. The diversity of landscapes is admirable. Through whole game you'd be able to experience four seasons, various of vistats, like in few different games. System requirements are quite high, optimalization should be a little bit better, but it is not that bad as spoken. Audio is generally good (but not each of english voice actors), but I missed memorable theme songs or typical sounds like from 2033 or Last Light. Silent protagonist is more irritable than before. He's able to speak during loadings (which are too long by the way), but not to his wife or comrades. There should be some dialogue choices in game, when is so much narration. Ofc it is FPS game, but with plenty of narration, sneaking and exploring. Another anoying issue is the morality system, which affects ending. It is too hard to get good ending. I wasn't killing my enemies (when I had a choice) mostly all the time and still didn't get the good one. It starts to be about stealth and sneaking, but as far as I remember we all expect atmospheric shooter. Moving back to advantages, campaign has really reasonable duration, many missions are interesting, crafting is simple and not annnoying, workshop and weapons mechanics connecting are nicely made. Gunplay is satisfing. Game itself is quite challenging. Last stages were terrefic (I mean frightening) and moving for me, that was what I expected. I don't give a damn thing about Denuvo or Epic exclusiveness, I reviewed a game, not someone's policy and it is a piece of solid shooter with interesint campaign. Worthly expierince for a single player, finally.
One of the best games i ever played dont listen to people who are mad because this game is on epic games store....

You definitely can not hold a woman without talking!!How can they make a first person game with no dialoge for the first person!Great graphics details and great gun play but it all feels like nothing real
Мне нравится чувствовать, что все вокруг сделано людьми - неидеально, местами криво, шероховато. А еще, игра даёт представить насколько велика страна Россия.

Me ha gustado el juego, la historia y los personajes. Glujovski ha creado otra fascinante aventura de Artyom. Llegando al ámbito personal, me ha parecido innovador la idea de sacar a Artyom y a sus compañeros de Moscú, pero esta aportación ha llevado al juego a tener algunos errores. El sonido en las acciones y en el juego en general me ha parecido mal producido (enemigos que se acercan y no se oye, que un enemigo te ataque y no haya sonido apenas...); y otro aspecto que me ha parecido mal ejecutado han sido los escenarios: zonas del mapa vacías, escasa interacción con el terreno, vehículos necesarios pero con fallos...; y para finalizar, un fallo de optimización que me ha ocurrido a mí, he podido jugar el juego en calidad media y mi gráfica debería haber sido suficiente para jugarlo en esta calidad entero, pero he tenido que bajarlo a veces porque daba tirones bastante notables.En conclusión quitando estas cositas me ha parecido un buen juego, a pesar de que es molesto de jugar a veces.  Lo recomiendo para los jugadores de la saga, pero me gustan más los anteriores.

Супер! Мене дуже тяжко затриматив в грі сюжетом, але тут це вийшло. Нереальна атмосфера, ти дійсно переживаєш всі пригоди разом з героями. І хлопці хто ще підтримає наших розробників крім нас! Я купив Gold Edition, і не жалкую, долучайтесь!

in my subjective opinion, the game is made amazing.The game is incredibly beautiful and accurately fart atmosphere of the Soviet Union and Chernobyl.The game has enough cons, but there is no need to forget that 4a does not have a huge budget.The game is made from the heart with the soul of the Russian people.

Должен сказать, что минусы, которые я привожу, выстраданы мной на собственном опыте, так как я провёл за игрой 85 часов. Не вижу смысла затягивать, итак, плюсы: +Отличная атмосфера. Постоянная напряженность от того, что стало с миром и с людьми. Для русских людей эта игра ещё более атмосферна, все эти старые вещи, речь и многое другое. А Новосибирск так вообще нечто.+Хороший сюжет. Мне тут нечего комментировать, вы и сами всё понимаете.+Неплохая графика. К сожалению я не имею возможности понаблюдать RTX на своём экране, но впринципе графика достойная.+Оружие. Его много, оно красивое и оно не чувствуется как бамбуковая палка.+Два Полковника. Очень душевное дополнение, было бы оно ещё длиннее, чем урок в школе, цены бы ему не было. Этих плюсов не много, но они достаточно весомые, чтобы я не возненавидел эту игру из-за её минусов, а они, поверьте мне есть и не малые. -Анимация персонажей. Когда игра только вышла всеми признана была плохая анимация персонажей и их лиц. Разработчики прислушались и сделали её ещё хуже, теперь у персонажей двигаются ещё и зубы. Люди так не говорят...-Оптимизация. Это просто ужасно на самом деле, но не настолько сильно печалит низкий фпс , сколько постоянные вылеты. Я не могу посчитать сколько игра у меня вылетела.-Автосохранения. Из-за этого минуса я решил прервать прервать очередное прохождение и забыть про эту игру до выхода истории Сэма. Сохранение может не проходить полчаса, а сохраниться в каком-то непонятном рандомном месте. Причём на сложности хардкор нельзя сохраниться в ручную (что решило бы проблему). Проблема достигает своего апогея в долине, так как убивать детей леса нельзя вообще, приходится перезагружаться, а как перезагружаться если чтобы начать заного надо протоптаться 3 минуты, пока добежишь до места, пока послушаешь болтовню, пока ползком не повырубаешь некоторых, после чего тебя видят сквозь стену и ваншотят, так как в отчаянии пытаешься вырубить противника, а этого просто по какой-то причине нельзя сделать. Разработчики не собираются это чинить, это понятно.-Артём. Я не могу понять почему он молчит, полковник Хлебников вполне хорошо говорит и это не выглядит странно, а Артём молчит, его спрашивают - он молчит, с ним ругаются - он молчит, шутки рассказывают - он молчит, жена кровью кашляет - он молчит, его хотят пришибить палкой - молчит и показывает пальцем. У Артёма даже актёр озвучки есть, вы что там делаете вообще? В итоге хочу сказать, что я не разочарован покупкой игры и не жалею времени, потраченное на неё. Но эти минусы... Остаётся надеяться, что следующая часть не повторит этих ошибок.
good game. beautiful and high-quality graphics. The continuation of the history of Artem 'and not various prequels, etc. We are waiting for the fourth part of the game
